Reviews.Title: “Far Exceeded Expectations”
Reviews.Author: Robin C
Reviews.Content: We actually booked our reservation at the Neorion based on glowing TripAdvisor reviews, and we're so happy we did. From the moment we walked in the door after being picked up at the airport by a hotel representative, we were treated like royalty by the very sweet and professional hotel staff. A guest relations concierge, Zeynep, welcomed us and presented us with Turkish coffee and fresh juices as she sat with us and outlined city highlights and helpful tips on getting around the city before presenting us with our own map and train schedule. Our room was spacious, immaculate, modern, and comfortable...we opted for the Superior room and had a wonderful verandah with a great view of the Blue Mosque and the Bosphorus. The hotel offers complimentary wine on the upstairs terrace from 19:00-19:30, where guests can gather to watch the sunset. The food was incredible...breakfast is a feast of meats, breads, eggs, yogurts, fruit, honeycomb, juices, and coffee, and always included a selection of local dishes, as well. Afternoon mezzes are available from 1300-1900, and were also impressive. We happened to be in town for my birthday, and the lovely staff brought a cake to my room and presented me with a lovely turkish coffee set as a gift...I was so surprised and moved by the personal touches and attention to detail. We have both stayed in tons of luxury hotels all over the world, and upon leaving, we agreed that Neorion takes the prize as the best customer service we've ever experienced. The hotel itself is also charming and comfortable, with great city views. We especially liked our bathroom...great lighting, spacious shower, and again, the whole place was spotless...we could've eaten off the floors. We're so glad we chose this hotel, and will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended”
Reviews.Author: John D
Reviews.Content: The Neorion is a very pleasant hotel in a great location for sight-seeing. The service from the staff was excellent, our room was clean and spacious, and the view from the terrace at sunset is not to be missed. The central location obviously results in some noise but the double-glazing and air conditioning are very effective.

Reviews.Title: “Great Property”
Reviews.Author: Jennie T
Reviews.Content: This is a very good hotel and we really enjoyed our time there. It's in a good location and you can walk to all major attractions. Also, the tram line (essential for getting around Istanbul) is right around the corner. The area is teeming with shops and restaurants. The rooms are nice, but not over the top; We had a room facing the street which was a bit noisy, but my sense is that most hotel rooms in Istanbul are like that...this is a lively, raucus city! They have an excellent complimentary breakfast, terrific appetizers late in the afternoon and complimentary wine each evening on the rooftop terrace which offers a nice sunset view of the city and the Bosphorous river. The front desk staff was very helpful, knowledgeable, friendly and accomodating. We travel a lot and we highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect !!”
Reviews.Author: petra82
Reviews.Content: Although I am not going to say something "original" about this hotel, I believe I must congratulate the hotel owner on his excellent choice of staff and his wonderful hotel in general. We stayed there in two rooms, 306(double room) and 303(twin room) for four nights, from 17th to 21st of April. I am absolutely sure I will stay there again the next time I visit Istanbul. It is very conveniently located next to Sirkeci tram station (which gives you access to Taxim by tram and funicular) and being in the historic centre of the city ,all major sightseeings (Aya Sofia, Blue Mosque, The Byzantine Hippodrome, The spice market, the Grand Bazaar, Galata Bridge etc) are in walking distance. As far as the hotel itself is concerned, it is a rather small one (approx 60 rooms) which are all big, very well equipped with huge bed, fine linen/pillows, a lot of storage room , wonderful bathroom and everything you need is inside (fluffy towels, slippers, bathsoaps including a wonderful cinnamon one) wooden floor and excellent cleaning.You are also provided with tea and coffee making facilities and turkish delights are offered in all rooms. Furthermore, its breakfast buffet is magnificent and it offers delicious meze-time from 13:00 to 19:00 hrs free of charge. We were also offered a free taxi transport from the airport to the hotel upon our arrival. Use of the pool, sauna and tzakouzi are also free of charge, you only pay if you need a massage. Furthermore, we were offered a 10% discount on several restaurants. Its best advantage though are the people working in it, who are all extremely nice, polite and eager to help, from beatiful PR Zeynep to the cleaning lady, the helpful young men in the reception who can find quick solutions to every problem , the polite waiters and waitesses in the breakfast room. Finally, the gesture of offering us a goodbye present was very much appreciated for its symbolism. If I must notice a disandantage, that would be that the rooms overlooking front (like 303) could be noisy and the ones overlooking back (like 306) have a view of a ugly building. But, that was not a problem for us since we only went to our room to sleep and there is a terrace with wonderful view of Bosporus on the top of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely staff”
Reviews.Author: Sallyalicante
Reviews.Content: There is not much I can add, but we loved this hotel and it's staff. It had a fun pool that our girls loved and the breakfast was very good. I just wish more hotels were like this. There was noise from the street but in this central area this is very difficult to avoid. The free afternoon buffet and the wine on the terrace were nice bonuses.

Reviews.Title: “An incredible Staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: Badis5577
Reviews.Content: For my first stay in Istanbul, I couldn't find a better hotel in a better location. From my reservation to my check out, everything was perfect. The driver who bring me from the Airport to the hotel, the warm and wonderful guest relation Zeynep who welcomed me, the staff at the breakfast and even the maid who cleaned the room every day with perfection. As working myself in hotel's management I can just congratulate every single person in this incredible hotel. Professionalism, generosity and warmth are the 3 bases of Neorion Hotel. If I come back to this wonderful city of Istanbul, I will definively stay in this hotel and nowhere else.

Reviews.Title: “hard to add to what has been said by others”
Reviews.Author: polonius
Reviews.Content: Already many here have raved about this hotel, and there isn't much I can say that hasn't been said already, but because my own experience was so flawlessly positive, I felt I had to echo what others have written. From the warm, sincere email I received on confirming my reservation, to the gift of turkish sweets I was presented with on departure, every aspect of my stay was wonderful. This is a small, intimate hotel, so don't expect the amenities like a huge swimming pool a large hotel can offer, but the Neorion was possibly the very best hotel experience I have ever had in a lifetime of travel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hospitality & convenience in the heart of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Liana C
Reviews.Content: An extremely well-located and smartly run hotel in the heart of Istanbul, with attention to detail, each guest's needs and requirements and a desire to always exceed expectations. Will definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “An amazing stay!”
Reviews.Author: Bleuu
Reviews.Content: Start to finish our experience at the Neorion was fabulous! We arrived at the airport to find a driver waiting for us (complimentary!!) and found ourselves at the Neorion about thirty minutes later. We were quickly escorted to their cafe, where Merve helped us check in and plan our weekend break. She checked back in with us frequently and assisted us with tram directions and ferry schedules to the lesser known sites our children had put at the top of their must-see list. Our room was a good size, very well-stocked, and even included a pillow menu. The family room was a favourable deal, as most other hotels required that we book two rooms. The breakfast was wonderful and had changing items each day and the mezze provided an opportunity for our kids to chow down while we regrouped and planned the rest of our day. Wine and salty peanuts on the roof at 7pm were an unexpected treat and allowed us to slow down and enjoy a beautiful view of the city and the water. Thank you to Merve and the Neorion staff. You are number one on Trip Advisor for good reason.

Reviews.Title: “Neorion Hotel exceeded all of our expectations and more.”
Reviews.Author: shirley t
Reviews.Content: From the moment we arrived at the Neorion Hotel in Istanbul we knew that we had made the right choice in hotels for our stay in Istanbul. The hotel is lovely, but it's the staff that really sets this establishment apart. We received a warm welcome and offered a drink and snack as we prepared to go to our room after our very long flight from California to Istanbul. Everything about this hotel deserves a 10+ on any scale of satisfaction. We selected the Neorion to stay a few days before our departure aboard the Seabourn Legend for a cruise of the Greek and Turkey Isles. Seabourn is a cruiseline known for their our standing service and attention to detail and The Neorion Hotel falls in this same category.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: ExpatAus
Reviews.Content: We recently had a great time staying at this lovely hotel in Sultanahmet. The staff were friendly and obliging, the room was small (to be expected), but well-appointed and comfortable, the breakfast and mezze were delicious, and drinks on the roof terrace, whilst watching the sunset and listening to the Call to Prayer, was a fantastic experience. We will definitely recommend this hotel to our friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS: My home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Viviajes
Reviews.Content: During our last trip to Istanbul, we spent 5 nights in this FABULOUS hotel. There are not enough words to describe the hotel, the quality of service, the rooms and the people working there. You have a bus stop close and all touristic places are very close (maximum 10 minutes walking). It is a real 5 stars hotel: lot of amenities, pillow menu, room service, Rooms are very good: lovely decoration, spacious and warm. The toilet has everything you need. The cleanness is remarkable. And you can feel that they clean up your room with love: you find lokum, towel decorations, everything is organized. Breakfast: you have lot of things to choose between beverages, cheese, bread, ham, fruits, cereal, yogurt, etc. From 13h00 there is a "mezze buffet" with lots of specialities from Turkish cuisine. Lovely!!! At reception desk you can find lovely people ready to help you and to give an advice. Our best host was Ugur. We would like to thank him for everything. He was in the evenings and helped us to organize our visits. With his advice Ugur made our trip unforgettable. Many thanks to all of you! We will recommend this hotel to our friends and we will come back, for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel in amazing and attractive Istanbul!”
Reviews.Author: Sannastiina
Reviews.Content: The hotel was fantastic and the location is excellent. The staff was very professional, friendly and helpful; breakfast is good and afternoon meze delicious. Room was nice and clean and even it was small it was big enough for us two. The bed was comfortable. Hammam in ground floor was worth of visiting and massage was unique experiment. We stayed 6 nights and we definitely recommend Hotel Neorion! It is one of best hotels we have ever stayed.

Reviews.Title: “They could not do enough to make our stay perfect”
Reviews.Author: eekeek
Reviews.Content: Incredible service, ammaculate, quiet, great location, outstanding spa, good AM and PM food, etc.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for the city holiday!”
Reviews.Author: mrgelatosandesu
Reviews.Content: Neorion hotel is a gem! The team staff are wonderful, the service is fantastic and the breakfast and hamam facilities are superb. The room was serviced every day and included two bottles of complimentary water every day, in addition to having a comfy bed and free wireless. The location for the sightseer is also perfect as it is a short walk to the Topkapi Palace/Hagia Sophia/Blue Mosque area, a short walk to the Galata bridge and ferries that take you to the harbour and close to the tram for short trips to other parts of Istanbul. The view from the rooftop terrace is special, especially at dawn and dusk. I could have stayed here another few nights to be honest.

Reviews.Title: “Well located and several unexpected freebies”
Reviews.Author: TomandNicki
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights over Easter after reading other reviews on Tripadvisor. From the point of booking the hotel staff were extremely pleasant to deal with, confirming the free airport transfer quickly and offering an 11% discount if we paid in cash which was very useful. On arrival we were really pleased - the hotel is in a great location, within about 5 mins walk of the Galata Bridge in one direction, and Aya Sofya/Blue Mosque about 10 mins walk in the other, and loads of good restaurants/bars/sweet shops in between. The hotel itself is very well maintained and our room was very pleasant, spacious, clean and tidy.We had free bottled water and a silver platter of turkish delights on our table The staff were very very good, making us feel immediately at home at check-in and everyone from the cleaner (who always said good morning), to the front desk staff, to the restaurant staff to the guy who was in charge of the swimming pool being exceptionally well-mannered, professional, and just pleasant to deal with. A real positive and something quite difficult to find in hotels we've travelled to The real factor that pushed this from a 4 to a 5 for us was what was (unexpectedly) included in the price. We had expected breakfast to be included, which was excellent (buffet of hot and cold everything of turkish and western european selections), but not the free glass of wine every night on the fantastic roof terrace overlooking the Bosphorus (surprisingly not shown on the hotel website), or the mezes from midday to 7pm every day, or the free half bottle of wine in our room to celebrate Easter. It all made the whole experience feel incredibly hospitable and gave us the distinct impression that the hotel takes enormous pride in going the extra mile, and ensuring its guests have a good stay. It made us really love our time there. Highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL & SPECTACULAR LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: evelyn_abravanel
Reviews.Content: There's absolutely nothing I can say about our stay at this hotel which would detract at all from our wonderful experience. The staff was unbelievably helpful, the food - - including breakfast and mezze - - was excellent and all the historical sites were in very easy walking distance (a very big plus). All in all, the hotel was special and only added to the wonderful time we had in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent hotel with great staff”
Reviews.Author: parvaneh T
Reviews.Content: Great location,great service,great breakfast and friendly staff.What would you expect for a relax trip?

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: labsrbst
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Nerion Hotel twice this year and both times our experiences could not have been better. The location, amenities, food and facilities were wonderful but the best part are the excellent staff. Everyone is friendly, goes out of their way to help guests and seems to enjoy the work they do. I would stay again at the Nerion when I return to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Deserves it's #1 ranking!”
Reviews.Author: MargotJB
Reviews.Content: Based on other TripAdvisor reviews, we stayed at the Neorion from March 25-27, 2012 and found that it exceeded our expectations. We arranged for the ride from the airport (for an extra but reasonable charge) and had no trouble connecting with our driver who met us with a sign bearing our name. Upon our arrival at the hotel, we were greeted warmly by Bahar and others and treated to a drink as we checked in. She explained breakfast and mezzes (extensive "snacks") times as well as other hotel amenities. Our room was very comfortable, the food delicious, plentiful and varied and the staff bent over backward to offer assistance. The owner introduced himself to us at breakfast one day and we saw him there the next day as well. The lobby is cozy, warm and welcoming with lighted display cases featuring various Turkish artifacts and antiques. The hotel location is EXCELLENT for exploring Sultanahmet on foot. We walked to Aya Sofya, the Blue Mosque, the Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace, the Basilica Cistern and to Eminonu to hop a boat for a 1 1/2 hour Bosphorus tour then hit the Spice Bazaar. All this from noon Sunday to noon Tuesday - and without killing ourselves! The hotel provides menus you can check out for 4 restaurants owned by the same group (Sirkeci) with a 10% discount for Neorion guests. We selected the Imbat restaurant at the top of the Orient Express hotel. Bahar called to make a reservation for us and even made sure we received the discount. It is very close to the Neorion and has a lovely view over the city and the Bosphorus with delicious, affordable meals. We were granted a delayed check-out the day we departed and were given a parting gift of Turkish delight, apple tea and another bag of candy - an unexpected treat. Bahar followed up with an e-mail following our departure and they seem genuinely interesting in suggestions for improving their hotel. We could think of none!

Reviews.Title: “Why stay anywhere else?”
Reviews.Author: SmallBiz
Reviews.Content: We just left the hotel after 6 lovely days there - absolutely fantastic. Our family of 4 (2 adults, 2 kids ages 12 and 8) stayed in the comfortable "Family Room" - a suite with 2 single beds and bath in one room and a larger king sized bed and bath in an adjoining room. Everything was delightful, right from our welcome drinks, friendly concierge, clean, modern rooms, free internet, free breakfast and free "meze" a meal served between 1pm and 7pm. There's free coffee and tea in the room, fresh turkish delight and they even leave 2 bottled waters free per room - every day! Makes the chain hotels look like cheapskates - wanting to charge you for everything. The pool, jacuzzi, turkish bath and sauna were fabulous. They have an excellent masseur or two on staff between 2pm and 10 pm. Highly recommend the Turkish bath - very relaxing. The hotel is right around the corner from the major sights - all walkable distance. You can easily take a tram to the ferry docks or just walk to the ferry at Sirkeci. We tried 2 of the four restaurants affiliated with the hotel - our favorite was the seafood restaurant. Kids did great here and the staff really care - they do go above and beyond. No wonder this place is rated #1. We're spending our last night at the W Hotel here in Istanbul - staring at a $10 bottle of water sitting on the counter. Go local - stay at the Neorion - it's not just value for money, they say they'll treat you like a family guest and they mean it.

Reviews.Title: “Just echoing the great reviews of this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Goguca
Reviews.Content: With so many people saying great things about this hotel (that's why we chose it) there is little I can add to convince you to choose it. There are indeed grand hotels in Istanbul (even two Four Seasons) but you will also risk getting to a small low quality hotel in an overly touristy area -even if you go for business, as we did. I have been in other hotels in Istanbul in the past but this one had all the charms to get me as a customer. When we arrived we noticed the very small desk in the reception area which only contrasts with the very big welcome that they gave us, inviting us to access a lounge and offering us some drinks while they were proceeding with the check in. The hotel runs a free breakfast and free afternoon mezzes lounge which looked really good but due to business commitments we couldn't enjoy. Also, they have sauna, pool, steam rooms and lots of amenities to have you entertained. Location is absolutely great. Next to all the sights. You can go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Bothercollie
Reviews.Content: Also immediately after booking Neorion staff were emailing me helpful information on Istanbul and inquiring how they could make my visit more enjoyable. After checking in this high level of concern for guests' satisfaction and comfort continued, they gave one the impression that you were their most important concern. I had a superior room with balcony with a great view. Bed was very comfortable and the room very quite. The bath was on the small side but I think that they did the best that they could with the space during renovation. Location was great, you are ten minutes walk from everything. The Tram, which can take you further afield is only 5 minutes away. There was nothing in the area around the hotel that makes one feel unsafe, even at night. Breakfast and tea were included and of good quality. After walking around all day, the hamat/spa in the basement was a welcome retreat. Whirlpool could have been hotter but that is my only complaint. It was clean and very well maintained. The public areas--lobby, dinning room, were a bit over heated for me but this appears true of almost all public spaces in Instanbul. A fan or something similar to move air would have been appreciated. All in all the Neorion is a marvelous and comfortable hotel, very well staffed, and in a great location. It is hard for me to imagine anyone finding disappointment here.

Reviews.Title: “Awsome stay”
Reviews.Author: WestonBT
Reviews.Content: Room was very well appointed, nice amenities, fantastic staff.

Reviews.Title: “Don't hesitate”
Reviews.Author: mss024
Reviews.Content: This is first time I write a review of a hotel. In the beginning I checked tripadvisor looking for best hotel , and I was hesitate after I did read all the reviews here regarding to neorion hotel. And really I did spend 5 nights and I did enjoy my stay in hotel with my girlfriend.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience, great value”
Reviews.Author: Ian V
Reviews.Content: This family owned hotel is located in the heart of the old part of the city within easy walking distance to all major touristic sites. The room was clean, spacious and surprisingly quiet considering it's convenient location to the the many shopping and restaurant options. The friendly staff were always on hand to offer advice on excursions and to assist with bookings. The bed was comfortable and a nice touch was the option to select from a choice of pillows ranging from feather to synthetic fillings. Never had this before! Another nice offering was the complimentary pick up service from the airport, the dish of Turkish Delight in the room and the farewell gift on departing- this in addition to the free wifi internet access throughout the hotel. Although breakfast was included in the price the choice and variety of foods on offer could have varied more( but then who's complaining considering all of the above.) Wonderful experience, great value! Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Beyond expectations”
Reviews.Author: pgbs
Reviews.Content: I won't repeat the many reviews that you've read about this hotel as by and large they are right on the money. I just wanted to thank the hotel for their proactive help on our recent stay. We booked the hotel car transport to and from the airport: the best decision that I made. On our return trip the car arrived right at 7 pm as booked and a very friendly young man greeted us and helped us with the bags. After about 15 minutes on the way to the airport, his mobile phone rang and he was speaking for a minute or so and then asked me whether I had forgotten my camera bag in the lobby of the hotel. I checked and I had indeed forgotten it without realizing it! As I started to panic he just said not to worry, the hotel had already sent it by another car and it would meet us before we reached the airport. It did. No fuss no charge no worries. Big tip well earned.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent.”
Reviews.Author: Takis_k
Reviews.Content: What can I say about Neorion? One of the best stays I've ever had. We planned the trip 1,5 month in advance and booked our stay here due to the ratings from trip advisor. Our opinion: Everything you read is true. The breakfast was excellent, with numerous choices, available from 7 to 11. After 13:00, the hotel offers complimentary snacks until 19:00. Hamam/pool/sauna is included at the room price. The staff has to be one of the friendliest crews I've ever met. The rooms are so clean you can literally eat from the floor. The bed was so neatly folded and relaxing, you could sleep there forever if only the hotel was not so close to almost every historical monument you need to visit. The only minus were the roadworks that was not the hotel's fault. Also, I must note that, during our stay, my girlfriend had her birthday and the hotel staff gifted her with a complimentary porcelain tea set, along with a departing gift. Definitely recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Optimal choice for tourists”
Reviews.Author: Vladis1968
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 nights and used free oneway transfer offered by the hotel, which was perfectly organized. The hotel is new and clean. Staff is very attentive and helpful. Perfect location, just short walk to Sofia. Standard basic breakfast. Hotel offers nice option - mese (choice of salads and snacks)Â from 1 to 7 p.m. which is included in room price. Free wifi worked perfect. The hotel does not have complete spa facilities or fitness center except small pool, sauna and hamam. However, this area is cosy and comfortable. Nothing to complain. Small cosy hotel with good price/value ratio.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: helenandsimonaway
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to agree with the other really positive reviews of the Neorion. It has a great location, really stylish decor and good facilities. However, what makes the place so good is definitely the staff. They are all so helpful, and there is always someone on hand to help with any questions you may have. When we were in Istanbul, we also stayed at the Ceylan intercontinental and the contrast with the staff there was very noticeable. When we asked for a restaurant recommendation at the Ceylan, we were directed to a dreadful looking tourist place which we avoided. At the Neorion, the staff listened to what we wanted and directed us to an excellent local place which we would never have found ourselves. The pool, jacuzzi, sauna and private hamam are all lovely, and the attendant there was so helpful it was a pleasure to use. One thing to add though, don't miss out on the areas away from the Sultanahmet district. The one good thing about the Ceylan was that we got to visit the area around Taksim Square which definitely feels less tourist orientated, and is great for shops, restaurants and cafes.

Reviews.Title: “Top rating:well-deserved”
Reviews.Author: Carol111525
Reviews.Content: The situation of the hotel could not be bettered for sight-seeing and it provided a welcoming, calm, friendly base from which to explore. The room/bathroom were spotless, the spa/pool area was great and we discovered the roof terrace to catch the first few rays of summer sun. Service was faultless. No reservations: go!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: anniewUk
Reviews.Content: Just back from 4 nights at the Neorion. This is a lovely hotel with very helpful, smiley staff. Nothing is too much trouble. The location is perfect - easy walking distance to all the major sights and near the tram stop and ferry for anything further afield. Room was sparklingly clean and comfortable. Roof terrace has breathtaking views of the Bosphorus and the Golden Horn. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “hard to beat”
Reviews.Author: me101
Reviews.Content: we were upgraded from the sister erboy hotel. well located, excellent breakfast and free meze in the afternoon. Pool and sauna most welcome after a days sightseeing. Staff could not do enough for you and were there 24/7. believe the reviews this is a very good hotel throughout.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings.”
Reviews.Author: LondonPianoman
Reviews.Content: Many positives about this hotel which have already been well documented.The location is great for all the major sights,the complimentary transfer to and from Attaturk Airport is most useful,very good breakfast & afternoon/early evening meze and the staff really are lovely...warm,friendly,courteous and nothing too much trouble.Spa facilities also very good which was a welcome retreat from the unseasonably bad weather. I must admit to being disappointed with the room however.The bed was certainly very comfortable but we had booked a "Superior" room at extra cost which was long and narrow with a very small bathroom (no room for a bath here).From the foot of the bed to the wall was narrow so no room for a chest of drawers that would sit a TV...this was further down the room & not designed for viewing in bed comfortably.When I returned home I revisited the website & the "Superior" rooms certainly look bigger in the pictures.I did in fact wonder if we had been assigned a standard double instead. The big selling point of the hotel is the staff however.The complimentary bag of goodies & farewell at the end of the stay was a lovely touch.Had the room been more as expected I would have given the hotel 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: “I will be back”
Reviews.Author: Kingdingruairi
Reviews.Content: Great, excellent, warm and friendly hotel. We where welcomed on arrival with a complimentary drink of our choice, great start! Although we arrived at 21.30 and really only had a brief but comfortable stay. Staff are helpful & friendly, rooms are well appointed and the beds are comfortable. I would easily recommend this hotel, and I am not normally easily pleased.

Reviews.Title: “Believe the hype, Neorion is a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: mpmacca
Reviews.Content: We've just come back from 5 nights in Istanbul staying at the Neorion hotel. We expected a very good hotel based on the reviews and the fact we were paying a decent amount of money to stay there (although not silly money). However it was the extras, attention to detail and overall sense of welcome that really stood out for us at the Neorion. The staff really couldn't do anymore for you and, from the moment we got picked up at the airport to our drop off there 5 days later, we felt comfortable and relaxed - an amazing feat in a big city like Istanbul, particularly if it's your first time. And they consistently went that extra mile: - free, delicious meze every day between 1pm and 7pm - free room upgrade - we were offered 11% off if we paid in cash, but unfortunately we weren't able to do this, however it didn't matter, they still took it off! - free drinks and talk through city map on arrival - free pick up from the airport - free goody bag when you leave - no pressure to buy or do anything you didn't ask for I could go on. As well as clean, quiet, comfortable rooms, decent buffet breakfast and a location right in the heart of Sultanahmet.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Go Anywhere Else!”
Reviews.Author: chriscManchester
Reviews.Content: Just visited this hote with a group of friends (see previous reviews). We were lucky eough to be upgraded to this hote and feel so privilidged and happy that we were. It was fantastic. The facilities were brilliant - great room, coffee/tea makings facilities and bottled water refreshed every day. Booked bed and breakfast but were offered snacks throughout the day included in the price. The breakfast was great with a choice of hot and cold. The pool and hamman were small but added to the holiday. It was within travelling distance of all the sites and transport. But the main thing was that all the staff from management, waiters and waitresses to the cleaner. They served with a smile and worked hard. Thank you to you all. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Good service”
Reviews.Author: Graham l
Reviews.Content: We found this hotel thanks to Tripadvisor rating and were not disappointed! We arrived late after a long day of driving and a real challenge finding the hotel after dark by car. The staff whisked our car away to a nearby lot, provided us with an upgrade to a top-floor suite with a fantastic view , thnksss guys

Reviews.Title: “THANK YOU NERION FOR MAKING OUR GROUPS STAY SO SPECIAL”
Reviews.Author: explorergr_10
Reviews.Content: I truly dont know where to begin. Everone who has done a review has alreaday pointed out all the wonderfull things about Nerion hotel. Im was extremely happy to Mr. Farouk, the owner of all the Sirkegi Conac Hotels, a very simple person as he puts it, who is there throughout the day, greeting and speaking with his guest. An extremely intellegent person, who really knows his business, and strives for perfection, begining from the beautifull decor, rooms, linens, breakfast, lunch meze, transfers, hummum, poo. There is also a roof top terrace which turns into a restaurant in the summer months, but still is beautifull to see the view, of the amazing Bosphorous, most importantly the way he chooses his staff, whom I found all to be excellent, always with a smile, never too tired to help in everyway. This is what a hotel business should be about, he has accomplished with all his hotels, as all the hotels have the same type of staff, and also has excellent restaurants which I will do a seperate reviews for, as they all have to praised. There are so many staff that I would also like to thank Ayse, for all our correspondances which more then 40 because of the large group coming from all over the world, to Marce, Fatih, Bahar, Im sorry I thought you were all wonderfull but cannot remember all names. Our entire group was completely not only satisfied, but will all return to this wonderfull hotel. Keep up the wonderfull work you do, and will always keep you number 1, which you deserve.

Reviews.Title: “World Citizen Approved”
Reviews.Author: ATLTRVLGUY
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with a group from all over the world. The hotel handled everything with class and elegance. The property was the best of the best!! The rooms, linens, hammam, great food, location, slippers, robes, and staff made this hotel an outstanding choice. You can walk to all the sights as well as easy transportation options. The hotel offers a great mezze every night and a breakfast that was brilliant! Transportation was easy with hotel arranging everything. This hotel and staff really strive for the best in quality and service without being overbearing. Stay here you won't be dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: “1st Class”
Reviews.Author: Ria06
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from our annual reunion with friends from all over the world, this year Istanbul was our chosen city,The Neorion our hotel, what a wonderful place to stay. All of the staff that we met were so hospitable and helpful and answed all queries, nothing was too much trouble, they were extreamly accomodating of our large group of 17 people. The hotel itself is everything you could need, clean modern rooms, lovely ensuite bathrooms with fantastic shower, tv, wifi, tea, coffee making facilities, hair dryer, bath robes, slippers, and toiletries etc. An excellent buffet breakfast, and afternoon buffet snacks, are served daily and included in the price, it is also within walking distance of the Blue Mosque, Haghia Sophia etc and Grand and Spice Bazaars and very close to the tram which is excellent for exploring this great city. We would like to thank the staff for making our reunion even more memorable and would highly recomend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “World citizen party loves this hotel”
Reviews.Author: sodim
Reviews.Content: We are a group of 17 people from all over the world as meet every year in Mars somewhere in the world.This year we go to Istanbul,some of us work in turist buissnes so we know how to reach hotels. But this hotel make us so satisfied we could not dream of that.the location is the best in Istanbul walking distance to a lot of attractions grand bazaar H sofi and a liot of nice polite resturang in the area,room big and newrenowetied very nice and clean ,breakfast buffe Worldclass also the staff in reception and the resturantestaff.Up on rhe roof is a nice area with amazing view. Go rhere please. In basement it a hamman and pool sauna so good,So my opinion of hotel Neorion us one of the best hotel i stayed in. Very very prize value The Presidente world citizen party 2012

Reviews.Title: “A real gem!”
Reviews.Author: leepy5
Reviews.Content: Istanbul is full of hotels - so much choice - and the Sultanahmet district is overwhelming full of good places to stay. Not surprising it is where the Blue Mosque, Topkapi museum, Grand Bazaar, Haghia Sophia, endless museums etc - in all over 20 cultural sites in this district and its neighbour Eminou; the Bosphurus can be seen in many places here. So if cultural viewing is your aim this is THE area to stay in. Having said that the other good places to look at and stay in are not intolerably far away - I walked a great deal - and there is a good, cheap public transport system. There might be better areas to stay in at night - restaurant choices etc - but the hotel desk is very good at advising where is good to eat - near and far - and if far will provide transport. Now to the hotel itself - other reviewers are right it is faultless. The staff are fantastically helpful - unbelievably so - and you will need guidance if you have never been to this wonderful city before. There is nothing really to fault about the hotel - all spotlessly clean, free afternoon meze, wonderful little pool, Turkish bath and spa. Good rooms with sheets cleaned every day if you wish and a really excellent breakfast. Great air conditioning that is quiet and yet very quickly makes the room warm or cold.....My only reservation in recommending this place is that it may be full when I want to return!!!

Reviews.Title: “Turkish Delight!”
Reviews.Author: DonTutto
Reviews.Content: No, not the sweets, even though those are amazing in Istanbul. I'm talking about the wonderful stay we had at the Neorion Hotel. The staff was wonderful, especially Bahar who helped us with all of our dinner reservations and gave us great recommendations. The breakfast in the morning is wonderful. And the location is couldn't be better. Close to the tramway station and walking distance to most of the sites in Sultanahmet. Our room was facing the Bosphorus and from our balcony we could see the Bridge and the Topkapi Palace. And from the roof top terrace you could see most of Sultanahmet and across the Galata Bridge and the Golden Horn. There's not doubt that here's where will stay when we come back to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “6 stars hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: Patrick H
Reviews.Content: Absolutely great hotel! Highly recommended for all travelers. We traveled with our kids and it was super from top to bottom. Thank you to all the staff, a super team who are genuinely caring about their guests; no matter their age! Keep up the great work

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, great stuff, beautiful room”
Reviews.Author: Orechietta
Reviews.Content: I've been staying 6 nights in the hotel and was really taken by the warm atmosphere. The staff treats you like part of the Neorion familiy and we felt really welcome. The stay always beginns with a short introducing about the hotel and the area which is really helpful for anyone who wants to explore Istanbul. Also I can recommend the transfer from the airport which was organised very well. Neorion is without any doubts THE HOTEL I would recommend for a stay in Istanbul. Also because of the excellent location and great view on top of the hotel :o)

Reviews.Title: “Neorion deserves to stay at the top”
Reviews.Author: Venevici
Reviews.Content: Could not fault the hotel or staff. We are seasoned travellers and experienced many hotels that look the part but do not quite give what is required. Neorion is the exception. Everything looks and works well. We did not find the bathroom 'small', as some have commented, It was more than adequate and the showers are excellent. The staff are very friendly and hard working. We support all the positive comments that have been said many times.

Reviews.Title: “second home”
Reviews.Author: Max J
Reviews.Content: it was just a super good hotel. excellent staff, who really showed me what hospitality means. the bathroom and room looked really new and the beds were confortable. we've spent 2 hours a day in the sauna, swimming pool and turkish steambath. the breakfast was good and delicious. the advises were also good. If i'll go back to Istanbul, i would certainly go back to Neorion hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly hotel in the tourist part of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: laserkid
Reviews.Content: Neorion Hotel is, without any doubts, worth to recommend it to anybody coming to Istanbul. It is absolutely clean and very well maintained object, with home atmosphere and friendly staff. The single room, I occupied one night, was rather small and practically without any view through the window. However, thanks that, I had not any noise in the night, which was complained in several reviews. The thing, which marks out this hotel, is expanded system of taking care about the guests, including the introduction letter, just after booking, arranging the car to the airport, helping in the restaurants booking, advising for the sightseeing etc. But sometimes some treatments could be slightly intrusive, like giving the recommendations only to the "sister" restaurants, belonging to the same business group. Generally, the area where the Neorion Hotel is located, seems to be very tourist. And it`s worth remembering before coming to the centre of Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Hotel and Service!”
Reviews.Author: Vis007
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 6 nights and had the best time of our life. Seeing that we were a family of four, they upgraded us to the family room at no extra charge. The hotel has a beautiful swimming pool, sauna and turkish steam bath. The breakfast was delicious and they have a snack buffet (1 pm to 7 pm daily)-lentil soup, breads, salad, hummus etc that could really make a meal. The location of the hotel is central to the historic area as well as the grand bazaar and the spice bazaar. Tips: Shopping is hassle free and reasonably priced on the Asian side.

Reviews.Title: “Another 5 star review for the Neorion”
Reviews.Author: Ken38
Reviews.Content: I don't think I can add much to what has already been said. We picked this hotel based on the Trip Advisor reviews and were not disappointed. We booked the least expensive room. Although the view was not great, I cant say anything else negative. Comfortable beds, nice shower, free water, and immaculate. Even a tray of Turkish delights. As mentioned by others, the staff is fantastic. They genuinely care about your stay and want everything to be perfect. Very nice breakfast every morning and great pool in the basement. Be sure to try the Turkish baths that they have.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: UncleSam01
Reviews.Content: We went to this hotel based on the excellent ratings on tripadvisor.com. We definitely weren't disappointed as this hotel was amazing in every aspect. First of all the staff was always very helpful and friendly and made sure we had the best experience possible. The location of this hotel is nothing but the best since almost all of the landmarks (such as Hagia Sofia, the Blue Mosque, Topkapi, the Grand Bazaarm, etc.) are located within a 10 minute walk. The hotel was very elegant and of course very, very tidy. The hotel also provides a spa and a swimming pool which we unfortunately didn't have the chance to try. We were also provided with a shuttle from and to the airport, free of charge. Therefore, if you are looking for a friendly and a cozy place to stay with a very good money/value ratio, this is your place!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel & Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: princesslecia
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I recently stayed at Neorion Hotel over a long weekend. Wow, I have to say first that the staff were outstanding in their attention to detail, and consistently provided 5-star service throughout our stay. The Hotel was modern, clean, and cozy. The beds were large and comfortable, and the bedding was soft and clean. They always provided plenty of towels, and free bottles of waters for our room (which were replaced by housekeeping daily). The breakfast spread was lovely; there were almost too many options to choose from which explained why we skipped lunch on most days. The Hotel also offers what they call 'meze', which was an afternoon buffet of snacks (runs from 1pm - 7pm). The choices consisted of a wide range of delicious Turkish morsels, which varied each day. The Hotel did not have a fitness center, but did offer a lovely but tiny spa to include two turkish style saunas, as well as a traditional one. It has a small heated pool, and a 'hot tub'; however, for American standards I must say the tub was anything but hot. The Hotel is centrally located in historic Istanbul. The main attractions, such as the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia are about a 10 minute walk from the Hotel. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at Neorion Hotel. They even surprised us with a departing package of Turkish candies and tea before our jaunt to the airport. I would definitely recommend this hotel for families, couples, groups, they cater to it all! Thanks again to the wonderful staff at Neorion!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in a great city”
Reviews.Author: KellyBryla
Reviews.Content: Beautiful room, super comfy bed, very friendly and helpful staff, tasty breakfast and snacks, and close to everything. There is nothing wrong with this place

Reviews.Title: “Terrific New Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rogers222
Reviews.Content: The Neorion is one of the many new mid-price hotels to open in downtown Istanbul in the past few years. It is better than most. The location is near the Spice Market, so it's a few blocks to walk to the Blue Mosque and Grand Bazaar, but it is a lively neighborhood with lots of shops and restaurants. Visitors can walk the bridge to the Beyoglu neighborhood. Positive: Brand new property, everything is new. Staff is fantastic, helpful, eager to assist guests. They offer unexpected and welcome assistance in many ways. Clearly there is good training and excellent staff management. The facilities are great, rooms are good-sized and well-appointed. There is a rooftop terrace, but I was there in the winter off-season and didn't have a chance to use it. Breakfast is included and quite good. Negative: The bathroom was incredibly tiny - a result of a bad design choice in planning the rooms. Toilet, sink, and stand-up shower are packed tightly into a very small bathroom space, while on the other side of the wall there is unused space in the main part of the guest room. The furnishings are rather cheap in some areas, for examples the floors are artificial laminates rather than real wood. I noticed the floor already showing signs of serious wear in some places after only a few months use. This suggests the hotel will age quickly. Choices were made in the construction process to keep costs down, but in about 5 years, this hotel may be falling apart. Also, apart from breakfast, there is no restaurant or room service. Not really a problem since there are many nearby restaurants, but it would be nice to be able to call for a sandwich and a beer when working late. Overall, an excellent hotel. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, Good service.”
Reviews.Author: TLCJJB
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is an excellent location in Istanbul. From the moment we arrived, we were treated to superior customer service. The bed was very comfortable, and the climate control was perfect. We enjoyed both the breakfast and the afternoon snacks (which can serve as a light lunch) The spa is nice, but I did not find a traditional fitness room with aerobic gear or weights. The street outside is under heavy construction, but quiet during the evening hours.

Reviews.Title: “Every hotel should take lessons from the Neorion”
Reviews.Author: Vic28
Reviews.Content: Iâ€™m afraid I can only add to all the praise already lavished on this hotel. I really cannot find a single thing wrong with my stay there, and a ton of good ones. Every hotel should take lessons from the Neorion. The welcome and service is (I would venture to say) beyond what even the Four Seasons offers. The price may be a bit steeper than other hotels in the area, but believe me, worth every penny. Factor in the free breakfast, free mezzes (which is really the equivalent of lunch), no charge for bottled water or drinks in the lobby, the FREE pickup from the airport, and this becomes the bargain of the decade. And IN ADDITION, the rooms are brand new (the building was totally renovated in 2007 when the hotel opened), with modern amenities, and a lovely little spa with sauna, swimming pool, and hot tub. About the ONLY suggestion I would have, would be to increase the counter/shelf space in the bathroom. I would also add that this is a great part of town to stay if youâ€™re a tourist. Most of the major sites are within walking distance, saving a bundle on cabs. Plus thereâ€™s always something to do just outside your door.

Reviews.Title: “Thanksgiving in Turkey”
Reviews.Author: wiscomilker
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Neorion Hotel for our trip to Istanbul last November, 4 nights split up by a trip down to Epheses for one night. Newer hotel with nice rooms and good breakfast. Service was excellent. Free transfer from airport & gratis welcoming libation a nice touch. Not cheapest in the neighborhood, but good alternative to the 4 Seasons options. Location worked out great, trams run 1 block away, but we never took. Walked to the Mosques, spice Bizaar, galata bridge, Topkapi Palace. Pool not big enough for swimming laps, just a dip after sauna. Pool at the sister hotel -Orient Hotel- a block away a little bigger & sure they would let you use. We did take advantage of the 10% discount coupons for dinning at the sister hotels' restaurants for dinner (Imbat & Neyzade) and had great meals.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: elizabeth m
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 4 nights this week. From the minute we were met at the airport for the complimentary transfer, to the sad leaving of this Guesthouse our experience was perfect. 4 "golden girls" travelling for a break had the best time. The staff are the most welcoming, helpful, polite and fun I've ever met. The advice given to help us around Istanbul was so spot on. The rooms and all areas spotlessly clean. Pool and spa small but perfectly formed. Food good the late lunch meze so welcome, warming soup after the chilly city really welcome; we ate in the restaurants belonging to the chain each one better than the last, make sure you go to the 7th floor restaurant on your last evening. Would recommend anyone travelling to Istanbul to visit this gem. The ethos of this hotel shines through all the staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: barthizzle
Reviews.Content: Stayed 5 nights here and i would definitely stay here again. Upon arrival they offer you a drink of your choice and explain the hotel and surrounding area. very helpful. it's in a great location. you can walk to all the attractions in the area, and the tram is a short walk away from the hotel for farther places. I never felt unsafe and we would walk back from the bars late at night. food is awesome and free. the rooms are nice and clean. overall, i highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Clean friendly small hotel”
Reviews.Author: FruitTrader
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night in February. Welcome on arrival was genuine and very friendly. Room was clean and comfortable rather than luxurious, a little noisy as it was on the street, but it is a big city...Breakfast was fine if a little unremarkable. All in all a very good small hotel, and good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Host in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: ZihanReading
Reviews.Content: I don't normally write reviews, always thought of doing the bad ones but ended up not bother of doing so. But with Neorion Hotel, I wanted to do it even before I left the hotel. 3 days and 2 nights stay in Istanbul has been amazing!. Normally when you stay at a hotel, it's all about the nights spent. Neorion is unique! Day and night, before and after does matter to them. Before the trip, they already sent a welcoming email/s with suggested links, etc. We arrived in Istanbul early morning and the hotel airport transfer was patiently waiting even our flight was delayed and luggages took ages to come out. As it's very early, our room was not ready and the first thing, we were offered breakfast while waiiting for our early check-in. Our room was upgraded from what we booked and when we got to our room, there was a welcome letter from the hotel OWNER with his mobile number, in case we want to request or complain - great. The room's good and most important, very clean. The breakfast was good and the complimentary mezze in the afternoon also shows the personal touch. The environment in the hotel was so relax. Even after check-out while waiting for our transfer to the airport, we were still offered drinks and mezze. We dined in 2 of Sikerci group restaurants too. The food recommended was good and the service was great too. Neorion Hotel said goodbye with a bag of gift - turkish delights, traditional sweets and apple tea! Very sweet and thoughful and made you miss the city when you arrived home. The team even sent you to your car and wave goodbye. And that's not all, there's an email waiting for you hoping you have arrived safely. Truly Turkey hospitality! Having travelling around the globe and have stayed in some of the most expensive and branded hotels. Neorion Hotel is so welcoming and unique - the team is a great warm host and I'm sure the Owner too. Keep it up! Will definitely recommend Neorion Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: irene_y_eduardo
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for three nights. The location is just perfect. Walking distance to Sultanahmet Square and to the Bosphorus cruises pier. The hotel itself is brand new and spotless. The staff was perfect, very helpful and made our stay very pleasant. If we ever go back to Istanbul, we will definetely go back to Neorion Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Hotel Of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: neil s
Reviews.Content: What a memorable stay. Grea Turkish food, especially the kebabs. Service among the best of the world. Five star luxury throughout. Felt like home with warm service from the staff who gom out of their way tio satisfy every request. Truly a great overall place tto stay when in Turkey.

Reviews.Title: “Unbelievably Good Services”
Reviews.Author: MLBartlett
Reviews.Content: I was blown away by the services ethic of the team at the Neorion. Nothing was too much trouble, they went out of their way to accomodate everything we needed. The fact that our plane was 6 hours delayed and that they were at the airport to collect us at 02:30 AM, was particularly appreciated. Well done to the team you made our holiday all that much better. Best services I have ever recieved, and I have travelled to over 20 countries. The rooms were nice and modern, clean well serviced and all things considered well spaced.

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Manfred Z
Reviews.Content: If I ever get back to istanbul this is my first choice when it comes to hotels.

Reviews.Title: “The greatest hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Maria M
Reviews.Content: I and my mum visited Neorion hotel in January 2012. We can`t think of any disadvantages of the hotel,because everything,absolutely everything is organized at the highest level!The staff is very friendly and we really felt like at home,when we stayed at this hotel. Breakfast,mezze,SPA,location-everything is great in Neorion. It was our first trip to Istanbul and due to the hotel it was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Neorion Hotel a home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: Afrakuma
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Neorion Hotel, they deserve to be number one on Trip Advisor. Not only was it an inviting haven from the moment I stepped in, the neighbor hood was also safe and centrally located. I was overly impressed with the manners of the house staff and the attention to detail that the front desk staff offered each time. They felt like family, I felt comfortable during my day shopping escapades to always come back to the hotel and ask the ladies if they thought I was getting a fair deal while bargaining and if I had entered reputable shops that had genuine goods. The hotel staff went the extra mile to check my records to ensure I was entitled to a cash discount since initially they were under the impression I had made my reservations through a third party vendor. I got a free airport transfer that I was not aware of till the service was graciously brought to my attention. Not only did I get a little farewell package of the finest Turkish deserts and tea to say thank you for staying with them but the front desk attendant walked me out to the waiting car and shook my hands to bid me farewell and a safe journey. It simply seemed like I was walking out of a good friend's home - they took every step to ensure I had a joyous stay. Finally the Turkish bath/massage was simply enchanting. To make it even better, they follow up with an email to make sure you arrived at your final destination safely and that you enjoyed your stay with them just as they enjoyed hosting you. Kudus Neorion hotel my home away from home!

Reviews.Title: “Great service, wonderful hotel, great location....what else do you need?”
Reviews.Author: Manuela D
Reviews.Content: I was there with my mom, which is quite picky, but we could not find any fault in this wonderful hotel. We actually booked at Orient Express, but due to overbooking we were moved to Neorion, which is brand new. Service is great, the young recepionist do their best to be helpful. Room was big enough, bed huge (king size), bathroom very clean. Great breakfast, we also had some free snacks when we got back early one afternoon. The spa at night was just perfect after a day of walking around (they provide you with towels and slippers for the spa directly in your room). Location is perfect: in the old part but close to the bridge to the new Istanbul and inbetween of two tram-stops. Defenetly a perfect stay in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Really good stay, but # 1?”
Reviews.Author: LauraParis_France
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 3 night stay, and have no complaints. We really enjoyed everything about our stay, but wondered if it was the best hotel in all of Istanbul in terms of luxury. That being said, we had a great stay and found it very good value for our money. The positives are as follows: - good contact with hotel staff prior to arrival - airport pick up was there and waited despite delayed flight - great information was provided to us upon arrival - room was modern, large, comfortable and clean (we particularly liked the large couch) - breakfast was ok, and afternoon snacks for guests was appreciated - pool area was good, especially the baby pool - best baby cot I've ever seen in a hotel :-) - all staff was very helpful - location is superb We have no complaints and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Cute hotel, fantastic service, strategic location - no faults!”
Reviews.Author: Aretusa75
Reviews.Content: We spent a weekend at hotel Neorion, and we had a brilliant time. The staff is incredible, they treated us like king and queen and they do go out of their way to please their customers. The breakfast is very good. I ordered a Turkish coffee one morning, which was delivered in a beautiful cup. So I said it was a very pretty cup to the waiter. I went back to my room and they left a present on the bed: two cups! Just like those I liked. When we left, they gave us another present: Turkish delights and sweets. The transfer to and from the airport was also included in the price of the room. They offer mezzes to their guests from 1 to 7pm, also included in the price!! The room was very cleaned (they even upgraded us to a suite!), the mattress was very comfortable. I am usually very fussy with hotels as I travel a lot, but I seriously cannot find any faults with this hotel. It is also very strategically located, being about 5-10 mins walk from the Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, the Blue Mosque, the Spice Bazaar. We will go back.

Reviews.Title: “Neorion home”
Reviews.Author: NaazraFallah
Reviews.Content: We were in Neorion hotel in January 2012 and are very happy to have chosen this place for our stay. I would call it not Neorion hotel but Neorion HOME, because they made us fell so comfortable that we if would ever go back to istanbul or anywhere to turkey we would only stay in Neorion. The staff there are so helpful and so graceful that u feel so free to communicate with them at any and every time. always smiling, ever ready to help, they went out of their way to help us in any and every way. excelent service, excelent people, excelent rooms, and every single thing was superb. Thank you Neorion for everything.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous new hotel in the old city”
Reviews.Author: Sharon021_11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Neorion Hotel for the first 6 nights of our 3 week travel through Istanbul and Greece in January 2012.This hotel set such a high standard that none of the other hotels could match it! The team is young and friendly and consistently delighted with the best customer service you could wish for. The free pick up from the airport at 6am brought us to the hotel just after 7am and we were offered a temporary room to freshen up and invited to have breakfast - wonderful selection buffet. When we got back to our room after a long walk outside, our bags were transferred to our room already.The mezze is an excellent offering and we enjoyed soup and other snacks after the long cold days out. Our room was 504 - very nice (bit smaller than I expected, but a good size) and the whole hotel is spotlessly clean. The roof terrace offers superb views of Istanbul. On checking out we received a free gift of turkish delight and sweets. This hotel is highly recommended and we would definitely stay here again if we were to travel to the interesting city of Istanbul again. Thank you to the Neorion team for making this a most memorable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Simply perfect”
Reviews.Author: gregandcath
Reviews.Content: This place thoroughly deserves it no1 ranking. The rooms, the staff, the breakfast, the location, the airport pickup, the views, the massage, all aspects of the hotel were all perfect. The even gave my wife a birthday cake !

Reviews.Title: “Our Best Hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: GreatHols333
Reviews.Content: From the first contact when we booked Neoriion Hotel for Christmas and New Year 2011/2012, hotel staff replied welcoming us and supplied details of very useful web sites about Istanbul, to the e-mail that greeted us when we returned home, saying that they hoped we had had a good journey home. We were collected us from the Airport and warmly greeted by reception staff, who gave us a map, useful tips on transport etc. and a welcome drink. We really enjoyed our holiday and I am sure Neorion hotel staff contributed towards this. They left us a card and gift for New Yearâ€™s Eve, they welcomed us on the terrace at the stroke of midnight with a complimentary drink and extended breakfast and meza times on New Yearâ€™s Day. The staff gave me a surprise on my Birthday with a cake and present, I have not blown candles out on a birthday cake for many years! Reception staff, waiters, waitresses all sang Happy Birthday. We have stayed in hotels all over the world but we can honestly say that our experience in Neorion has been a very special one. Neorion staff, all of whom contributed to making our holiday in Istanbul a fantastic trip we will never forget. We booked this hotel because of the comments left on TripAdvisor and were so pleased that we did, we can not recommend this hotel highly enough, the staff offer genuine hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “It was royal attention & service to us!”
Reviews.Author: Natalya F
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Neorion hotel for 5 days in Jan, 2012 with my husband. We got not only great service & attention to us, but amazingly warm & friendly hospitality what made us feel as at home with friends around. Everythihng was great, included meal as lucnhes & breakfasts, swimming pool, hamma, turkish sauna, free wine what was offered for us by the time of arrival. People (hotel staff) gave us all helpful answers on our questions, adviced for us where the best to go & what to see, where the best to eat, etc. We were assisted on 100% & felt there as we VIP persons there. Amazing clean white soft bed lining, very comfortable accomodation in the very center of Istanbul, surrounded by multiple cafes & great restoraunts. I recommend this place for everybody who really want to come to Istanbul, enjoy the trip & get incredible positive emotions. We got more than just hospitality, we were treated like royal family. This is an amazing hotel. Thanks so much for everything. We will come there again & again.

Reviews.Title: “They really do try to make your stay memorable”
Reviews.Author: GlobalServicesGuy
Reviews.Content: The whole experience of booking the stay, checking on a dinner reservation, checkin, briefing on a one day tour, checkout, transfer to airport were all handled exceptionally well. We celebrated my son's 21st birthday and they went out of their way to make it special. Its a well run hotel, with good rooms and exceptional staff in a great location for touring the old city. Easy to get to from the airport on the train and tram - one easy change. Then easy to use the tram to get to the sites or walk to many. Keep doing it - many hotels could learn from your approach.

Reviews.Title: “Never again!”
Reviews.Author: James M
Reviews.Content: I went to the Neorion Hotel just prior to Christmas 2011 and I have to say I was dissappointed with the poor service they offered. Rooms were very claustrophobic and bathrooms were not as shown on the website. No good view from the room and noisey. Overall very poor. I don't how it is number 1 on Tripadvisor. I suppose the breakfast was good, and if it wasn't for that I would have not finished my nights there. BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: “Neorion is an excellent hotel with wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: John1234567890
Reviews.Content: In all our travels, this was the first time we experienced personal attention with warmth and hospitality. The staff - from the front desk through to the restaurant and the cleaning staff, all were equally kind and good at what they were doing. The hotel is new, clean and a most pleasant place to spend your vacation. We will recommend this hotel at all times. Well done Neorion, we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “First Quality Customer Service.”
Reviews.Author: J-R-and-Bucket
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at Neorion for week, during which time I injured my foot on some wet marble out in town. The staff were very sympathetic and provided me with every imaginable service available to help me get around the city. They went so far as to find crutches from a medical supply store, arrange for meals in my room, set up taxis and shuttles and all the airport assistance I could require. We found the place warm, well furnished comfortable and very clean. The breakfast food was very good and the free daytime snacks made it a natural place to congregate in between daytime sightseeing expeditions. The house wine was outstanding, and the associated restaurants were a great sampling of the local cuisine and a very nice value. We found the staff courteous and pleasant, with a very good grasp of English. Prices were very fair and the overall impression of the trip was extremely positive. Highly Recommended, without any hesitations!

Reviews.Title: “Exelent”
Reviews.Author: lageb
Reviews.Content: A stay you will remeber Very helpful and charmfull staff. This hotel is a top of the range. You will not be disipointed to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST WE COULD HAVE EXPECTED”
Reviews.Author: Brunswick01
Reviews.Content: Fabulous hotel. Great staff Luxurious rooms Breakfasts to die for Spa to envy Location second to none Owner does walk abouts He is a great guy We cnnot wait to return!!!

Reviews.Title: “Charming hotel with amazing service”
Reviews.Author: Rafael G
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the best choice for a couple of reasons. The location is just perfect, walking distance from the main attractions and the tram station. Lots of shops and restaurants nearby (including their own which is really good). But the main differential is the outstanding service, the staff is truly kind and helpful. And there was so many nice surprises during our stay such turkish delights in our room and champagne on the rooftop to celebrate the new year... The entire hotel is new and beautifully decorated, including the room that was spacious and very clean with good shower, great amenities, comfortable bed and sofa, a good heater not to mention the free meze every afternoon which is so nice, specially the soup! The breakfast was also very good. We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel! And we definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful New Year's at Neorion Hotel, Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Julie C
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely hotel - nice rooms, great included breakfast and all afternoon apetizers, welcome overview and drink, comfortable beds, immaculate rooms, and nice spa. It's also in a great location to see the major sites. But really, I'm sure there could be nicer and more opulent hotels in Istanbul. What makes this hotel special is the staff. I'm not sure I have ever been treated better anywhere and by anyone in my life. And all is offered with such kindness and sincerity. It was difficult to book some of the cheaper and well rated options for this last holiday. I hoped to find a cheaper choice for both this stay and future stays. But after staying in this hotel, it would be like returning home to visit family and not staying with them. I just couldn't consider it!

Reviews.Title: “What more to say?”
Reviews.Author: Hansiman
Reviews.Content: When we booked the #1 hotel, are expectations were high. To be short: the hotel lived up to it. Starting with a free transfer from the airport, a nice welcoming drink and a nice (and very clean room). The hotel is in walking distance of all Istanbul's highlights and is perfect for a city-trip to this beautiful city. As hotel guest, you get 10% discount in restaurants that belong to the same chain and those are all real good restaurants. As the Neorion is not a large hotel, you really feel at home and all friendly staff will do theri best to contribute to that. When we checked out, we were asked whether we had any recommendations and we had only one: don't chance anything. It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, with a caveat.”
Reviews.Author: p_sf
Reviews.Content: The prior glowing reviews are spot-on in my opinion. Service here is outstanding, the rooms are comfortable and immaculate, and it's also quite a reasonable deal financially. I would absolutely recommend and stay again, however only if the hotel could ensure a room off the street side. The general street noise is bearable, but there is a nearby construction site which seemingly operates 24x7. We didn't notice on the first couple nights, likely because the site was shutdown for x-mas. But when it started up again there was loud heavy truck traffic, dumping noises, and general construction noise until well after 1 AM. Of course I can't fault the hotel as they have no control over the situation, but it should be a consideration for fellow travelers. In keeping with the fantastic service ethic of the hotel, they graciously offered us an upgraded room at a nearby sister hotel for our final night, which was very much appreciated. I don't think the noise would be noticeable in rooms away from the street, so if you're able to secure a quiet room (or if you're a heavy sleeper), I can whole-heatedly recommend the Neorion. I would also note, as a general bit of advice for first-time visitors to Istanbul, that the Sultanhamet area might be ideal only for a short stay. Most of the major sites are here, and quite near the hotel, however the area seems exclusively focused on tourism and you can knock out the sites in a couple solid days. After a few days it felt a bit stale. For longer visits to the city, I would stay in Kadikoy or the New District, which seem like more interesting and vibrant areas (and getting to Sultanhamet from either is very easy via tram or ferry).

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, believe the reviews!”
Reviews.Author: VamonosDeViaje
Reviews.Content: Good location, nice hotel and everything the other reviews say but, what makes a difference is the service their staff provides to all guests, very friendly and ready to help in anything needed. We were more than nicely surprised when we came back to the hotel on our first day and found that they had arranged for our baby boy, not only a baby cot but also a baby bath and baby towel.This attention to us and to small details is what made us feel special. I am bad with names, so apologies to the receptio and customer service guys at the hotel. All of them were so helpful when asked about tourist spots and arranging taxis. By the way, I suggest you to take taxis arranged by the hotel as taxis in the street will most certainly cheat you either taking the longest route or pressing buttons in the taximetre to charge you double. To make it short, if you are planning to visit Istanbul and want to stay at a small cozy hotel near the historic sites, do not hesitate to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location; wonderful customer service and great concierge service! A 10 in my book!”
Reviews.Author: lostnyctraveler
Reviews.Content: This hotel has made my stay in Istanbul so comfortable! Everything was just right and whoever we met was so welcoming and nice. The rooms were tastefully decorated and the tea and Turkish Delight was always served in the most surprising ways :-) we were close to everything and the breakfast SA wonderful too. Altogether, I will say this has been a wonderful experience! Thank you to the wonderful hosts!!!

Reviews.Title: “Happy Travelers”
Reviews.Author: len b
Reviews.Content: I want to thank you all for a WONDERFUL stay at your beautiful hotel last month. We were so impressed with the hotel, the room, the staff, the service and the breakfast and mezes, too! Everything was great and I look forward to recommending Hotel Neorion to anyone planning a trip to Istanbul (a really hot destination now). The location is fantastic; we heard many complaints from others on our cruise (departing from a dock a short cab ride away) about the distance into the major sites from those staying in big hotels in the 'fancier/newer' part of Istanbul. We loved that there were many restaurant choices nearby, too. Our cooking class at your sister hotel was one of our highlights! I hope you offer this at Hotel Neorion in the future. Cooking is so popular today - and so is tasting the delicious food! Again, thank you for a fantastic experience, Happy Travelers

Reviews.Title: “Excellence”
Reviews.Author: Laurent S
Reviews.Content: I seldom write to tell an experience, but I must admit that this Hotel Neorion is excellent and their staff make it almost perfect. So they truelly deserve their number 1 in Trip Advisor and although I know next time, it will be more difficult for me to book there because it will be full, nevertheless they truelly desserve their success. About the Hotel, everything is good, but their Spa is a must for such an hotel. It is a Spa you find only in some major five stars hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Over priced”
Reviews.Author: Gruuu
Reviews.Content: The room was nicely prepared and the overal quality was good. But the rooms are small and we couldnt sleep because of the construction nearby... If you can book for 50 EUR absolutely go for it.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, location, comfort, and convenience”
Reviews.Author: Istanbulbul
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Neorion for 3 days in December for our anniversary while exploring Istanbul. Location was in Sultanhemet close to Restaurants, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia, Topkapi Palace, and walking distance to the Tram which will take you to Taksim Square (new city), Istikal Cadessi , and the Dolmabache place. Staff went out of their way to be helpful. Breakfast included many different local and western choices. I would definitely recommend this hotel for a perfect stay in Istanbul. Great food choices in nearby restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “perfect location, quiet room”
Reviews.Author: sylviatravel186368
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 days in istanbul and enjoyed our stay at Hotel Neorion A quality hotel in a great location. We would have no hesitation in staying again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: TammyMcAwesome
Reviews.Content: We were supposed to be staying at the Erboy hotel while in Istanbul, but we were upgraded to the Neorion because it was new and it our honeymoon! The hospitality at the Neorion hotel was amazing. Everyone was so wonderful, the room was spacious and clean (even by North American standards, which is rare for European hotels...), and the location was perfect. I do not have enough wonderful things to say about this hotel. Highly, highly recommended. Hands down the most hospitable hotel I have ever stayed at.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel and staff”
Reviews.Author: stefku
Reviews.Content: We spent a week at the Neorion Hotel in early October. The room was impeccably kept, the location near all the key sites, and the staff were gracious and helpful. I travel extensively, and the Neorion staff created a sense of home that most luxury hotels try to duplicate but rarely achieve. We look forward to our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Kam A
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had an amazing experience at Neorion Hotel with a wonderful and warm welcome from the hotel team. They made our stay a memorable and unforgettable one. The location was fantastic minutes away from the main attractions. We will definitely go back there.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing, 5 star experience”
Reviews.Author: exmason
Reviews.Content: The Neorion hotel was the stay of a lifetime. We were upgraded at the last minute from another hotel in the group, but if we visit Istanbul again I don't think we would be able to stay anywhere else, regardless of price.
