It has its own private hamam, a delicious buffet breakfast, free snack food in the early afternoon, very knowledgeable concierges, a stunning rooftop view of Sultanhamet and the Aya Sofia etc, and extremely comfortable rooms. The rooms deserve special mention - great beds, powerful showers, and tastefully decorated. On our first night we were stunned to receive a small pot of Turkish Delight on our pillow - the first of many, welcoming surprises you'll experience at the Neorion. If we visit again we will without doubt be returning to the Neorion. (and I haven't even talked about the perfect location, or the free transfer from the airport, or the free dinner at the rooftop hotel - delicious by the way)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel + Excellent Location = Amazing Experience”
Reviews.Author: mcmack1
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed at the Neorion for 2 nights, and the entire experience was amazing. We were greeted at check in with a drink, and then the concierge sat down with us and showed us places to go / eat / shop for the two days we had to tour. The little details really made the experience - besides a good breakfast buffet, every afternoon there are complimentary snacks (mezze, fruit, bread, soup - really a light dinner). Also, you get a card for 10% discount on a few nearby restaurants. You have to try the turkish bath / massage....really cool experience. While it isn't one of the really ancient baths, it's more private and the massage was excellent. Definitely happy that we chose to experience the bath in the hotel. Hope to go back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, outstanding hospitality”
Reviews.Author: CuD_unterwegs
Reviews.Content: First of all, the Neorion well deserves its fantastic tripadvisor rating and can be highly recommended. The hotel is well located, sights and nightlife in walking distance, it is well equipped with spa and roof top terrace (panorama view), the room we had was good in size and very clean. Breakfast is substantial with cold and warm local specialties, keeping you happy until afternoon when Neorion is complimentary serving a Meze buffet (Turkish starters). However, most remarkable is the outstanding hospitality: it starts with picking you up at the airport, welcome drink served in the cosy lobby while friendly, perfectly English speaking staff gives recommendation what to do in Istanbul. During our whole stay, with no exception, everybody was very friendly and obliging. They even surprised us with a birthday present (obviously found out from passport). They gave us the feeling of being home all the time. We definitively will come back.

Reviews.Title: “Great locations with very easy access by metro train and tram.”
Reviews.Author: CommOfficer
Reviews.Content: I really like this kind of hotel. It feels very much like a home instead of a hotel. It's on a street with construction but that stops when it gets dark and starts when you should be awake so its not a bother plus the windows did a good job along with the curtains keeping any noise out. The bed was great and they actually have optional pillows you can request. That's a great plus and I should have tried it out. On the roof there is a deck with a great view of the surrounding area. Great place to take photos. During the colder part of the year there is no food or anything served up there but its quiet and you can relax if it isn't too cold. In the basement the pool and sauna were really nice. The staff was outstanding and always helpful to include the ladies who meet you and then tell you everything you could ever ask about concerning the hotel and the area. I have been trying to think of something they can do to improve and I can't think of anything.

Reviews.Title: “Just wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Irishgirlabroad
Reviews.Content: Having travelled quite a lot for both business and pleasure I can honestly say that the welcome we received at the Neorion Hotel was the best I have ever experienced. From the moment the taxi pulled up at the door to the time we left for the airport everything was just wonderful. It was great to be offered a drink upon arrival while the reception staff processed our check-in and we had the great pleasure of meeting with Ms Meric Unlu the Guest Relations Manager who ensured that we were orientated as to the location of the hotel in respect to the tram station and local attractions. We were also given a family card which gave us a 10% discount off the menus in their sister hotels. (We ate in two of them and had great meals in both - seperate reviews on those). Our room was on the fifth floor and at the front of the hotel and apart from the call to prayers waking us the first morning we never heard another sound (maybe we just got used to it). The room was a good size, very clean and the kettle with tea and coffee sachets etc. was great. I loved the bowl of Turkish Delight on the pillow. There is a small pool, sauna and hamman in the lower floor level which was wonderful to return to in the afternoons before heading out for the evening. We had the mezes offered on the first day before heading out for the afternoon and they were so lovely we had them again on the second day before going to the sauna... There is a little newsletter printed out everyday that provides information on activities in the local area that day as well as some historical references. There is a great roof terrace offering views out over the Bosphorus - and although we did not use it as the weather was too cold it looked like it would be a great place to relax with a drink in the evening. For anyone with concerns about which hotel to stay at...worry no more..just choose the Neorion and relax and enjoy your stay in Istanbul..

Reviews.Title: “A delight in every Turkish way”
Reviews.Author: Karin B
Reviews.Content: My two adult children, husband and myself were recently guests in the Neorion Hotel for four nights. We were impresessed by the service, food, location (sometimes a bit noisy outside) and over all appearance and ambiance of the hotel. We loved the spa area, and made good use of the pool, sauana, turkish bath and jacuzzi after a busy day touring. The lentil soup was a hit in the early afternoons. The staff were well versed in English and were helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing staff and service”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth H
Reviews.Content: We spent 5 nights recently at the Neorion Hotel - it definitely lived up to the expectations set here! We had never been to Istanbul before and had heard all the horror stories about taxi rides, so the free transfer to the hotel with a driver was a real selling point. Unfortunately, due to air traffic control problems, our flight ended up coming in seven hours late, at 12:30AM, and the driver wasn't able to meet us. A quick phonecall to the hotel, and a new plan was sorted out, and we got a ride with a driver from another nearby hotel. A good reminder to always carry the contact information for the hotel with you, even if you will be picked up! After that, everything went smoothly, and the hotel was so welcoming and comfortable. The room was clean and quiet. We had a room on the 6th floor on the back of the hotel, so it did not have a view, but did have nice natural light and was very, very quiet. Wonderful touches in the room, including Turkish delight, and a fresh carnation sitting on the washcloths one evening. The staff were excellent help getting activities planned - we wanted to see the ceremony with the whirling dervishes, but had heard that the Medlevi Lodge might not be open, so had the concierge desk call the lodge for us, only to find it was closed. But not to worry, they found an alternative, which was closer by and perhaps better than the original. Dinner reservations were handled perfectly, and the hotel's sister properties had great food! The breakfast buffet was very good - lots of interesting choices. My favorite was the Easter bread, which is a slightly sweet and very soft bread with powdered sugar - a great sweet treat in the morning. There were lots of choices of cold cut meats, cheeses, breads, cereals, along with hot scrambled eggs, potato wedges and sausages. Everything was great! The mezes were available for about 6 hours in the afternoon! And had so many choices that we could make a late lunch out of the offerings. Our flight schedule was seriously messed up due to some kind of problem with Croatia Airlines and the Turkish Air Traffic Control, so not only did we arrive at 12:30AM, but we also ended up having our flight delayed outbound, and so found out the day before our departure that it was rescheduled to depart at 1:10AM. When we talked to the desk about having our bags held and arranging a driver, they checked the schedule, had a spare room, and actually rearranged things to allow us to stay in our same hotel room (free of charge!) until it was time to leave for the airport at 9pm! Now THAT is service!! All done with a smile and genuine hospitality! Fabulous place!!

Reviews.Title: “Turkish delightful hotel”
Reviews.Author: CTM95
Reviews.Content: We spent 6 nights at Neorion Hotel, and with each passing day fell more in love with the place and the people. It is sparkling new, with understated but elegant features such as marble trim and travertine stairways, museum-like pieces displayed in the common areas, and the beautiful clean tiled spa area. Mostly loved coming back after a day touring to warm greetings by people NOT selling you anything but the comfort of being home. Rooms are comfortable, convenient, and meticulously tidied daily. We stayed in the standard quality queen double room -- perfectly suited for a couple -- though not remarkable as hotel rooms go. The bed was comfortable, but morning came early with the amplified calls to morning prayer at nearby mosques preceding any hint of dawn (and there are always mosques nearby in Istanbul). The sunflower shower head makes for a wonderful shower. We stayed on the 5th floor, which had a very small balcony window and a teacup view of the Bosporus. The 6th floor has premium rooms, I think, and likely better views above the surrounding buildings, but the easily-accessible rooftop terrace has the best views. You will not suffer for lack of beautiful views in Istanbul, even if your hotel room does not have one. We loved the breakfast buffet, with plentiful combinations of sweet and savory, traditional Turkish (I suppose) and Continental/American -- they were able to accommodate both of our divergent breakfast needs. Although we did not take much advantage of the late afternoon buffet/snack, it appeared to be a nice assortment of foods to tide over hungry folk until the traditional 8PM dinnertime. . We took great advantage of the spa, using the sauna to warm away any chills, the whirlpool to massage aching backs (note the whirlpool/jacuzzi is not heated above pool temp.-- only about 82F -- which we liked once we got used to it) and the tiled-in pool to take leisurely laps (it is probably only 7.5m long). The spa became an everyday event following a day of sightseeing. The private steam baths and massage area looked inviting but we didn't indulge. It should be pointed out that the hotel location, while convenient to sights and transportation, is a little bit funky. The street, like many in Istanbul, is in a state of flux--evidencing both disrepair and construction. Neorion is one of only two nice hotels on the block, and it appears likely that others on Orhaniye street will soon be built and/or renovated. It is located just thirty meters off the tram line where bustling restauranteurs and shops provide services to both locals and tourists. Right near the hotel, the mix is more locals than tourists, in fact. Finally, and most importantly, the Neorion staff is its biggest selling point. Each was humble, warm, willing to assist with anything but without being over-solicitous. Nothing was expected in return for this service, except they seemed to appreciate our gratitude, and in fact we left with a small gift from the hotel staff! Everyone had good command of English, and I am told, a variety of languages. In a city full of merchants you have to be constantly vigilant. Many of the folks you encounter are hungry for tourist dollars/euros/lira, and although most transactions are conducted with politeness and humanity, there is still a sense of contest at every turn. Not so when you are welcomed "home" by the Neorion staff at the end of your day or evening. They greeted us with a sense that the contest was over for the day, we had all survived, so feel free to go get a bite, or a relaxing spa, or take a long winters nap. Their treat.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay!”
Reviews.Author: smf44
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Neorion for a total of six days during November. Of all our travels around the world we found this to be one of the best hotel stays. What stands out is the exceptional SINCERE service of all who work there. They are young and full of energy and willing to help your stay be the best it can without needlessly or formally hovering around you. In addition to the service the hotel and room are spotless. The bed is exceptionally comfortable and the bathroom is great. Complimentary water. We stayed on the sixth floor and had some views of local mosques and the water. Breakfast was very good also with the fresh squeezed orange juice standing out. We had a room upgrade as well as a complimentary parting gift. The location is excellent and in addition within easy walling distance of the harbor and local sites. It is also on the tram line for longer trips. I would highly recommend anyone visiting Istanbul to stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Neorion Hotel Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: bill k
Reviews.Content: Excellent, comfortable hotel. Great service from polite and friendly staff. Very well placed for major monuments, transport and shopping. Buffet breakfast and afternoon meze were excellent value. Genuine Turkish hospitality made us want to return

Reviews.Title: “What a Great Hotel in a Great Location”
Reviews.Author: Sandra K
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Neorion on a 4 day Istanbul break. Wonderful location and easy walking distance to the Bosphorus ferries, Topkapi place and the heritage sites. Plenty of good atmospheric restaurants just round the corner with the tram at the end of the road. Really friendly and helpful staff; we were genuinely sad to say goodbye when we left. Our room was spacious and modern clean and bright. I really looked forward to breakfast, a wonderful buffet with a wide ranging selection of food to suit all tastes. Best to me was honey from a honeycomb. Complementary Meze available most of the afternoon was very welcome. Amazingly there is a beautiful bijou swimming pool, sauna and turkish bath in the basement. Modern and clean yet extremely atmospheric with beautiful Turkish blue tiles. We swam every morning before breakfast. We would really recommend this hotel and will stay there again when we return to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel with Amazing Service”
Reviews.Author: Grant T
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at the Neorion last week and really enjoyed our stay. The staff at Neorion go above and beyond to serve from your first contact until you leave they anticipate and fulfill your every need with a smile. From the room to the buffet breakfasts to the location to the the small needs you would not even expect in a large 5 Star Chain hotel, everything was perfect and very professional. It felt more like staying with a family than spa consumer experience. We definitely plan On staying there next time in Istanbul. Thank you to Bahar and all who made our vacation special. I only wish I could have taken those amazing pillows home.

Reviews.Title: “Best Service you can get in a hotel”
Reviews.Author: Theprinchi
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Neorion twice during our trip to Istambul ( november 2011). I don't know if there is more than a 5 rating because if there is one they do deserve it. The staff is amazingly professional and yet attentive and friendly. There was not a time when they were not willing to respond to our questions and needs, even in the midst of trying to respond to other guests they would manage to respond to our inquires of places we needed to go, arranging for taxis to pick us up from any locations we were not familiar with. Bahar and Fatih ( two our dear friendly guests services personnel) were never too busy to make sure we were doing ok and having a good time whenever we were going to. We travel twice a year for pleasure and we have been in numerous hotels in different parts of the world ( different number of stars as well) and without any doubt the most impressive feature about this hotel is their staff and the impeccable service. It was a bit sad to have to say bye to them although I know we will go back there whenever we will go back to Istambul.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & exceptional Staff”
Reviews.Author: Muhammad T
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed a lot during my stay in the hotel, Staff is very kind to us, we feel like a family, everything is best, the tradiotional buffet breakfast was exellant, the pickup and drop service was very good and punctual, we feel secure, free wifi, Tea and coffee making facilities, Neat & clean rooms with wooden floor, all main tourism sites are very nearby walking distance like Topkapi, Sultan Ahmet Mosque, Grand bazar. Great staff welcoming you with a smile at all times and give all kind of guidence you need, In my opinion everything was exellent and hope again stay with the same hotel and recomend to my friends,

Reviews.Title: “A problem that had to be solved”
Reviews.Author: nizaq
Reviews.Content: My wife uses a wheelchair and we travel several times a year our last trip was to this hotel between the 4th and the 13th of November we did choose this hotel based on its standing and reviews. The hotel is perfect for all regular people who do not use a wheelchair. There are few steps on the entrance and a few more entering the restaurent. when we entered the hotel my wife and I were a taken back since we booked the handicapped room in a hotel that was handicapped accessible, when we entered the room there was one low step entering the bathroom which caused a problem coming out of the bathroom and the bed was 40 cms below 50 to 55 cms which is the minimum for wheelchair users. We had a problem which needed to be solved. It was the start of Bayram the Islamic Turkish holiday and I was worried that people in charge were starting their holidays and I was wrong. The Night manager told me that he informed upper management of the situition and to please wait till the next morning till the problem is solved and the first management decision is that they will not charge us for the 1st night plus they will serve our breakfast in room. The next morning the owner Farouk came personally to see me after going over the points I mentioned he suggested we go see his other hotel the Sirkezi Konak (Number 4 tripadvisor) which we did The hotel entrance is accessible Farouk was great and we quickly became friends he assured me he will do his atmost to solve my problem and he did just that he ordered ramps for the neorion he did a ramp for the bathroom he elevated the bed we stayed 2 nights in the neorion and 7 nights in the Sirkezi Konak We loved it. Handicapped people should help establishments in stating their needs before booking HOTELS should be accessible if they claim they are and if they are less than that they should help handicapped people like these great people did Farouk and his managers in both hotels are scarse to fing nowadays they carry their responsibility and wont let it go until they please you People!!!!!!!!!!! Travellers!!!!!!!!!this is service We send our love to both hotels

Reviews.Title: “Best service you'll ever find”
Reviews.Author: RoamingJerome
Reviews.Content: There are many reasons the Neorion Hotel has reached #1 on Trip Advisor so quickly after it's opening, the first of which you enjoy before departing for Turkey. The Guest Relations staff began emailing us regarding airport pick-ups and finalizing details over a week before our trip, thus we felt secure that everything would be smooth. Our arrival at the reception area could not have been better; since the Neorion only has 54 rooms, it never felt crowded or pressured to hurry through anything (meals, coffee, discussions w/ guest relations). The initial welcome drink and tourist map overview were very welcome to get our bearings straight on where we were in Istanbul. A quick run down of using the tram/metro was nice, even though most things are user-friendly and/or in English. Our room was very well-appointed, with one of the biggest and most comfortable beds you can find in Europe (particularly from a boutique hotel). Nice hardwood floors, a lounge couch, and some neat artwork were very welcoming. The hotel is located in the Sultanahmet area, mostly known for tourist sites at the Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia, Blue Mosque, and Grand/Spice Bazaars. Each of these is a 10-15 minute walk away, or 1-2 stops on the tram line. We felt the location was perfect for everything, even spots in the Iskital area, which takes about 30 minutes to reach. The true beauty of the Neorion is in it's staff. They go out of their way to ensure your experience in their city is a memorable one. From booking dining reservations (at their partner restaurants or others), to knowing the opening/closing times of nearly everything, they are there for you. We found the prices for coffee/wine to be better in the Neorion than nearly any other bar/cafe in town. In better weather, I'm sure the rooftop terrace would be a bustling area, however in mid-November, it was rainy and windy, thus meze was offered in the breakfast area. Breakfast included is a wonderful offer for many travelers, and with restaurants opening a little later in Istanbul, I'm not sure where else you'd go for a good cup of coffee (aside from the many Starbucks around). Warm and cold options are there for the taking, and again the small size of the hotel meant breakfast was never a swarming mass of people. Coffee and tea are both plentiful and tasty, and we enjoyed this each morning. The meze from 1400-1900 was a nice break in the day- we often came back from haggling in the markets or sightseeing for a quick snack and glass of wine/turkish coffee before heading back out. To repeat for the fourth time, the Neorion is truly the classiest hotel in Istanbul. I cant imagine staying anywhere else, as you are greeted with true 5-star service and quality, for a 3 star price!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: patricia ann p
Reviews.Content: Had a most wonderful stay at the Neorion hotel for an entire week in early October 2011. The hotel is ideally located in a side street, close to the Golden Horn, Galata Bridge, a five minutes walk to Hagya Sophia, the Topkapi, the spice market. So a perfect location for discovering the city walking. The rooms are very clean, nice, large and sunny, and I personally loved the rooftop terrace with a 360 view of the city. The entire hotel and amenities are new, well built, and pretty. Great hotel. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional staff”
Reviews.Author: jAlfano
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 7 days Nov 1-9. Outstanding location for viewing the historical center, access to the Spice market and Grand Bazaar. Wonderful beds in decent size rooms with hot water pot with instant coffee and tea. Spotlessly clean. Very small but nice bathrooms with rain shower heads. Adequate breakfast with limited offerings but enough for most people (and great coffee.) Slow but free internet connection that works with Macs, iPads, iPhones. Truly lovely staff. A few minor problems were addressed immediately and without question. We loved the Neorian.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and convenient location”
Reviews.Author: Oscar A
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Neorion with my wife and family just two weeks after they opened in June. Although not all the facilities were finished (turkish bath), the staff really made up for it. We were offered complimentary dinners at any of their chain restaurants and we could use the facilities at their nearby hotels. Anyways, facilities should be ready by now. The rooms are well designed and the pillows are super comfortable. You can really rest after a busy sightseeing day. The staff is very helpful and hospitable (something not that easy to find in Turkey, I must say). They even gave us a pillow as a gift! Location is quite convenient with easy access to public transportation and walking distance from main attractions in the old district.If youÂ´re plan is to really explore the city, thhis is the place. The only inconvenient would be to come back if you go out late night, but you can always grab a taxi (just be careful on agreeing on the prce before jumping in). Overall, highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Marvellous!”
Reviews.Author: Sheila C
Reviews.Content: This was the epitome of great service and hospitality. My husband and I stayed here for three nights a couple of weeks ago during our honeymoon and were given the attention and treatment that one expects from people who truly value and understand customer service. We were thoroughly pleased. The facilities are new and very comfortable, the staff, well... superb at what they do. The food, oh the food...Both the brekfast and the dinners at the restaurants owned by the hotel group, absolutely superb. The wine of amazing quality (. We only regret not having taken some of that wine back with us. We recommend it and will make sure we return on future visits to Istanbul. Superb! We left on the day of the earthquake and are saddened by the events and aftermath of that day. Our prayers and thoughts are with all affected by the tragic event and we wish strength and prosperity for such a warm and welcoming people.

Reviews.Title: “A Gem of A Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Not_The_Donald
Reviews.Content: The TripAdvisor community really has this one right. We chose the Neorion because of the excellent reviews on TripAdvisor and found it to be every bit as nice as the reviews suggested. The room was spotlessly clean, comfortable, and well maintained. The rooftop terrace offers memorable views of the city, the breakfast bar was generous and varied. Best of all, the staff understands "hospitality" in a way that too few hotels do these days -- everyone with whom we came in contact was friendly, helpful, and gracious. We look forward to returning someday.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Roger A
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed twice at this hotel in the last 2 months (Sept 1-9 and Oct 27-29) and both times found it to be fantastic. Staff incredibly friendly, helpful and enthusiastic, great location and facilities, couldn't be better. We would have no hesitation in staying again.

Reviews.Title: “Everything a hotel should be”
Reviews.Author: chris5799
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I spent three perfect nights at the delightful Neorion Hotel in mid-October. The location allowed us to walk or take public transportation to all the sights and was an convenient oasis when we needed to escape and recharge in peace, comfort and security. Our room was large and spotless with free wireless and a comfortable bed. Breakfast and afternoon mezes were just right, fresh and tasty. And the best for last... the service was warm, welcoming, professional and smart. We were in good hands. Consider yourself lucky to be a guest at the Neorion Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great location to see the sights, friendly, helpful staff, clean well designed rooms.”
Reviews.Author: PeteBurtonshaw
Reviews.Content: A simple modern hotel without many unnecessary frills in a perfect location to walk to most of the sights in Istanbul. Staff friendly and welcoming, always offering advice. Perfect for a short break.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay in a fabulous city”
Reviews.Author: Lunch-in-the-city
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Neorion hotel for four nights in October. We were immediately greeted by the staff and offered a drink to relax; an employee sat with us and showed us on a map the thousand things we could enjoy in Istanbul. We had booked a deluxe room, which was absolutely worth it. The room was spacious, comfortable, beautifully appointed, with large windows. The balcony was small but offered fantastic views of the city. The bathroom was perfect with a large shower, jacuzzi tub, plenty of soap/shampoo/gel/towels. The bathrobes were new and soft. The room was spotless and cleaned every day. We went to the hammam in the basement three times, but wished we had gone more! We had a turkish bath massage done (the room is beautiful, all marble), as well as regular swedish massages. The staff at the spa is experienced and friendly. The location can't be beat. The hotel is walking distance to lots of attractions (topkapi palace, hagia sophia, the blue mosque, the cistern, the spice bazaar, the grand bazaar, the port for tours, galata bridge, etc), and right next to the tram and train station. A buffet breakfast is included, maybe not the highlight of the day, but certainly convenient. Snacks and drinks are also available in the afternoon. The staff is young, friendly, always ready to help. This was our first trip to Istanbul and staying at Neorion certainly contributed to our instant love for the city. We will surely come back!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding hotel with tons of charm”
Reviews.Author: Steve21217
Reviews.Content: I've had the good fortune to stay at great hotels in major cities worldwide, and rank the Neorion Hotel as among the best. The rooms are very well appointed, stylish, with only the best fittings. The location can't be beat, with much of Istanbul's treasures within a short walk. All guests are given attentive service, with a personalized orientation offered to everyone soon after check in. I truly found nothing to disappoint from check in to check out. I will be back and consider this THE place to stay in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic New Hotel in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: francc
Reviews.Content: So the facade of the hotel is unspectacular BUT as soon as you enter you will know that you have chosen the right hotel for your stay. I have been to Istanbul 20 times and this hotel has to be the Best ever in its price range....and the Welcome definitely the Best in Turkey. The staff immediately make you feel welcome as if you are their old best friend who they have not seen in years. And this is they way they will make you feel throughout your whole stay whether at breakfast or having a drink in the lounge or wanting some help from them. Incredible ! The location is very good. Less than 100 metres from the Sirkeci tram stop which is 5 minutes by tram to Sultanahmet. 10 minutes walk to the Spice Bazaar and 5 minutes to Eminonu where you can get ferrys and tours on the water. The rooms are a decent size and very tastefully put together, new, very clean, good beds and pillows etc. and there is free wifi throughout the hotel. A nice terrace on the rooftop with great views. There is even a Hammam and Pool. I would say the Best Value in Istanbul ! Totally Recommend It.....if you can get a booking !!!

Reviews.Title: “Nerions Misafir, the best of the Turkish Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Sanja T
Reviews.Content: I had wonderful 4 days of total relaxation, warm hospitality and first class service. The hotel is in the perfect location, tastefully decorated spa and rooms. The personnel help you immediately after the arrival with helpful, discrete suggestions and a BIG SMILE!!! You can enjoy the spcially taken care spa area and have a massage And yes true I felt very special too... about being their Guest.

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality and terrace with fantastic views”
Reviews.Author: LindaPeek
Reviews.Content: I never felt so welcome in a hotel as in Neorion. The staff was extremely friendly and interested. The breakfast was generous and the mezzes in the afternoon very nice. The terrace has fantastic views and you can order a drink there as well.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: Fifone
Reviews.Content: Me and my friend stayed in this hotel one week and had a magnificent stay. Everything here is excellent! If Turks are well known with their hospitality, the Neorion hotel family is much more; they really make you feel the most special! And the hotel itself is very new with beautifully decorated big rooms and high standard sauna department downstairs. Also it is ideally situated for all the city sights, walking distance almost everywhere. The breakfast is very tasteful and nicely untill 11 am., so you dont have to hurry in the mornings. So you really feel you are on holidays! This was our third visit in Istanbul and because of the Neorion, definately the best! Next year we are coming back and for sure staying in this brilliant hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: raddersLondon
Reviews.Content: I don't usually comment on hotels that I have stayed in, but felt that the Neorion really deserves a mention. It is wonderfully clean and the room that we stayed in was large, well decorated and spotless. The breakfast was lovely and the staff are just so wonderful, nothing is too much trouble and they are all so friendly and welcoming. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Istanbul, and will most definitely be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality!”
Reviews.Author: Maasman
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for three nights and we were really impressed. Not only is THE hotel spotlessly clean, rooms big, rain shower and has free mezze in THE afternoon. THE best was THE real hospitality we experienced during our stay. Great hotel!

Reviews.Title: “"Nothing was too much"”
Reviews.Author: E S
Reviews.Content: Perfect beginning with an unforgettable end!! Having travelled extensively, hospitality, character, charm and dedicated and commited staff is often one of the most challenging elements for hoteliers, but this place had it all. We were accepted as a family member at Neorion, so much so that when they found out it was our 50th Wedding Anniversary our final 2 nights stay was covered by them. BRAVO!! everything was perfect; food, the quality of the service and rooms. Thank you Neorion and to the fabulous staff!! Burhan & Veci A.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Stay”
Reviews.Author: Stephane L
Reviews.Content: Had a most wonderful stay at the Neorion hotel for an entire week in early October 2011. The hotel is ideally located in a side street, close to the Golden Horn, Galata Bridge, a five minutes walk to Hagya Sophia, the Topkapi, the spice market. So a perfect location for discovering the city walking. The rooms are very clean, nice, large and sunny, and I personally loved the rooftop terrace with a 360 view of the city. The entire hotel and amenities are new, well built, and pretty. What really makes the difference with other hotels is the staff. Always there when you need them, always ready to help, to organise, to find out whether something is possible. The fact that you always have someone who can get tickets, organise a trip, etc. really simplifies the entire planning, and some of the tips are really good. So in brief: Excellent location, very nice hotel, superb and extremely helpful staff, I simply loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Bliss in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Jean T
Reviews.Content: From the moment we walked through the door we were made to feel welcome and special. All the staff, no matter what their role, were friendly and able to advise us on hotel matters and sightseeing. The hotel is new and ideally situated within walking distance of the major tourist attractions. We loved the rooftop terrace view at sunset, accompanied by a complimentary glass of wonderful Turkish wine. A week staying at the Neorion flew by. The breakfast choice is amazing - plenty to fuel you for all that exploring the city. You can catch a tram not far from the front door. At the end of a full day in Istanbul the Neorion was a luxurious bolthole to come back to and recharge the batteries. When the staff farewelled us, there was a genuine feeling of saying goodbye to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Neorin Care Factor 100%”
Reviews.Author: BAA_VIC
Reviews.Content: The icing on our cake was the hospitality Neorin Staff provided. Their evening staff were just as good as their day staff. Constantly asking of our needs and requests. If they didn't have it they made sure they could get it. Breakfast was tasteful plus with afternoon tea .... The accomodations/facilities were very comfortable, spacious, spotless... hotel location ideal....close to transportation (trams/fairies/train station & sights even within walkable distance (some up hill but that was OK). Even though the area is central to the old city and very close to the tram road, eateries with live entertainment the hotel location was not noisy at all. We had a party of 6; myself/husband/10 yr old son, my parents plus newphew; we had a range interests Neorin was able to cater for all of us very well. On top of everything that they had done for us they wanted to know what more that they could do to help us feel more at home & more comfortable. Thank you Neorin, we will be back........

Reviews.Title: “A Really Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: sugardens
Reviews.Content: We originally booked our stay at the Erboy Hotel but when we arrived (at midnight) we were told we'd been upgraded to their sister hotel round the corner as they were full. Lucky us! The Neorion is a far superior hotel. It's quite new. Everything spotlessly clean. Rooms large and very comfortable. Breakfast generous. Complimentary meze in the afternoon. Swimming pool, sauna, steam room in the basement. Plus we had free transfer to and from the hotel to the airport. All this at Erboy prices!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: scooterCalgary
Reviews.Content: We chose Neorion based on TripAdvisor comments and were not disappointed. We chose a superior room on the 6th Floor and had our own balcony...a very nice place to have tea in the sun. The location was very central and within easy walking distance of all the sights of Old Istanbul. The rooms (as well as the rest of the hotel and pool/spa/Turkish bath) were spotlessly clean. The staff (Bahar and others) were most helpful and always willing to provide ideas or advice. There is a very nice terrace on the 7th floor...unfortunately it was getting a little to cool at nights to enjoy it. Overall, very happy with our stay at Neorion and would be happy to return.

Reviews.Title: “What a great Hotel !”
Reviews.Author: ghazaoui
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Neorion for one week. Add to previous comments, this brand new hotel is by far the best one we tried in Istanbul. Rooms are light, spacious with all you need (coffee/teas) and even Turkish delights !. The Staff made everything they could to assist us during our stay. At Neorion professionalism and Hospitality go hand in hand. If you are undecided about where to Stay in Istanbul, look no further, this is your hotel !!Confortable rooms with all modern amenities, Cheerful staff, Fresh and tasty breakfasts and afternoon snacks, and the location adds to the greatness of this Establishment. Thank you Neorion for making it a wonderful experience. We should see you again next time we visit your Magical city. Mohamed.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect citytrip hotel!”
Reviews.Author: RosanneWaardenburg
Reviews.Content: We were upgraded from another hotel in the group to this newly built hotel just around the corner. We were happily surprised! Beautiful design, very clean and quiet and the friendliest staff around. We would definately recommend Neorion to anybody visiting Istanbul!

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money”
Reviews.Author: Aladin20
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect, not being on the main street the noise is less. Newly renovated, clean, fresh, room was specious, furnished with up-dated facility. Front office staff & Guest relation were very helpful & friendly. The health club is nice & cozy, after a long visit day â€“ a Turkish bath was a perfect place to relax; I did experience one scrap massage and I do recommend. Breakfast buffet was correct, small but you find what you need; service during breakfast is friendly but might need to increase one more staff to make it more efficient as well the refill of the buffet. I was very pleased and I will select this hotel for next visit with my family.

Reviews.Title: “Do yourself a favour and stay here”
Reviews.Author: divebunny1
Reviews.Content: I decided to stay here based on the reviews on this website and I'm glad I did. The staff at the Neorion are by far the best out of the 11 hotels I stayed at while travelling around Turkey. They go out of their way to provide friendly and professional service from the welcome drink and orientation briefing when you arrive to the warm goodbyes when you depart. The rooms are spacious by Turkish standards and the small touches like complimentary water/tea/coffee and a arrival gift of Turkish delight were appreciated. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. They even have a pillow menu. The breakfasts and afternoon mezzes were great. The pool / sauna / hammam are the perfect way to unwind after a busy day of sightseeing. I can highly recommend the inhouse Turkish bath and Swedish massage. Great location. Walking distance to most attractions. Also close to the tram line and Sirkeci train station. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Just Amazing...”
Reviews.Author: Nuno R
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel, beautiful, clean and high quality, with a roof in which we are invited to make a toast to life while watching the sunset. The hotel offers a welcome drink while we have a brefing about Istanbul and wait for the check-in. Great service, friendly service, staff very attentive and friendly with customers, the room and shower room with very spacious, the bed is big and comfortable. The internet is fast and free. Breakfast with high quality and varied. This hotel has a prime location is very close to major tourist attractions making it possible to make the most of walking, or transport (tram and ferry, both near hotel). Istanbul is a very interesting city, with a lot of mysticism involved in some mosques, palaces ... We hope to return thereand certainly we will be in Neorion Hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay in Neorion Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: ASTRID994
Reviews.Content: We (a group of 12 friends) had a wonderful stay at the Neorion Hotel. Before we went we asked the hotel to make us some reservations and they were very helpful in every way. We've received a very warm welcome on arrival and this feeling didn't go away during our stay. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the rooms were good and very clean. The location is perfect, you can walk to most of the tourist sights of Old Istanbul. The complementary extra's like the snacks in the afternoon and the glass of wine on the terrace during sunset made the experience complete. A wonderful experience! We highly recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “couldn't be better , a unique experience:) loved it, loved it, loved it”
Reviews.Author: Taraneh
Reviews.Content: i stayed in Neorion hotel in mid September and to be honest it was the best Hotel that i have ever stayed in . it is a place where you are not only treated as a precious guest but also as a friend . EVERY ONE of the staff is warm and welcoming and always ready and willing to help . there are the most amazing Ladies at tourist information desk who always have perfect suggestions about places to visit and dine and shop . they were also so caring and nice that arranged a surprise birthday for us in the lobby which made this trip even more unforgettable . our room was spotless and i had the best night sleep . housekeeping people were also attentive and always provide everything you required . just enough to say the minute i stepped out of the hotel i missed every body and everything about this amazing amazing place .

Reviews.Title: “MLE11”
Reviews.Author: Molly E
Reviews.Content: Our group of three couples were very impressed with the reception we received on arrival, the care, attention, and warmth extended to us by the staff throughout our stay. The hotel is lovely and we couldn't have been more comfortable or wanted for more. The evening visits to the terrace to watch the sunset with a complimentary glass of wine was a special treat. We certainly recommend the Neorion to anyone looking for a great location and beautiful accommodations. Wish we could have stayed longer but would love to return. Thank you for a wonderful first experience in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “A home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Bert946
Reviews.Content: We (our adult son and us) stayed at the Neorion Hotel in Istanbul for four nights at the end of September 2011. As first time tourists in Istanbul we were very happy that the staff provided us with a free transfer from the airport. On arrival at the hotel, we were pleasantly surprised by the unique reception â€“ we were offered a snack and something to drink, given information about sights to visit and a map of Istanbul, and made to feel we were genuinely welcome in this amazing metropolis. This feeling didnâ€™t let up during our stay; the little extras like the Turkish delight in the room, the wine complementing the sunset on the roof terrace, the meze in the dining room in the afternoon and the delicious breakfast in the morning made our stay very special. The young and professional staff were always available to give advice and information. Because the Neorion Hotel doesnâ€™t have a restaurant of its own they give a generous discount on the other restaurants in the hotel and restaurant group. We tried three out of four and were impressed with the high quality of the food and the great level of service. We highly recommend this hotel with its professional and friendly staff to anyone who wants an exceptional hotel in a truly special city where east meets west.

Reviews.Title: “Suited our needs down to the ground - perfect”
Reviews.Author: Chissie
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the Neorian for 3 nights (22nd September to 25 September) with my husband and adult son. We were greeted by Baha when we arrived who was most helpful, not only about aspects of the hotel but tips about Instanbul, what to see and how to get around. The rest of the staff were very friendly and helpful as well. The rooms were great. Clean and a lovely shower room. The breakfast was good as well. Also afternoon complimentary mezes were offered which were delicious. A complimentary glass of wine was also given to watch the sunset on the roof top which had great views. Also a good location. I will definitely recommend to my friends and would stay here again if we go back to Instanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay in Neorion Hotel”
Reviews.Author: HusainQ
Reviews.Content: I had stayed in this hotel for 6 days from Sept 13 till Sept 19, 2011 - My trip was for fun with my family. My stay was awesome. Staff are professional, Room and Bath were clean, Breakfast was great, Location is perfect, Service was wonderful, and finally I will come back to this hotel for every visit to Istanbul. The hotel offer afternoon buffet, and Turkish bath which I enjoyed very much. The location is near major sites in Istanbul in SultanAhmed area.I recommend staying in this hotel to all of you.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect in Every Way”
Reviews.Author: kizzy19
Reviews.Content: I will just add to the other reviews and agree totally that the Neorion offers a great hotel experience in Istanbul, walking distance to all the major sites, lovely rooms, comfy beds, immaculately clean and every possible service available to their clients. Free buffet in the afternoon, red wine on the terrace at sunset, lovely breakfast, kind staff they did not fall down once. After I had lost my stamps for some postcards, they offered to post them for me as I was leaving. I must also add the swedish massage I had in the mini spa was fabulous after a dayÂ´s sightseeing on your feet I can highly recommend it! The Neorion also offers discount to their clients who decide to eat in their restaurants, we ate in the Ottoman style restaurant not far from the hotel and it was delicious and the service was excellent. Congratulations to the owners and all the staff of this hotel their dedication to their clients appreciation is quite remarkable and not often found these days even in top 5* establishments.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel with the kindest professionals!!!”
Reviews.Author: SUNKING14
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from a five day stay at the Neorion hotel. No words are sufficient enough to express the charm of this hotel. Quality, professionalism and the beauty of it all will make your stay there a real pleasure. Needless for me to repeat what has already so well been said by so many others on the welcoming drink, Turkish delights and daily free evening whine served on the hotel rooftop facing the wonderful port and Marmara sea. The beautiful rooms, classy pool with sauna and Turkish baths. It is without a doubt the best place to stay in Istanbul for the value and being so close to all historical sites. By the way, I ate three times at the group restaurants(Inbat, Pazerade...)and frankly if you really want have a romantic evening in a rooftop restaurant with a view on the sea and historical sites, this is without a doubt the palce to go!!! Forgot to mention that the food is very close to what you would find in a fancy restaurant in Brussels or Paris but not the price which is so low, in my case, I had an appetizer, main course, one beer and one glass of whine for the equivalent of 22 EUR. If you go to Istanbul, don't hesitate and reserve at the Neorion hotel as you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Hakeri123
Reviews.Content: It is not easy to choose hotel in Istanbul. We wanted close to the sights, old city, shopping, sea, swiming pool! Really hard but I have read reviews on trip advisor and choose Neorion. Great choice! Completely new, beautiful spacious rooms with wooden floors. Clean. Hotel stuff so kind and offering great service. Swimming pool clean, turkish bath. Warmly recomend.

Reviews.Title: “Had a Fabulous time!”
Reviews.Author: Vipin R
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel and our experience was fantastic! The moment we entered we felt warm and welcomed and were treated with Turkish delights! The staff, location, food everything was great at this place. Its walking distance from most of the attractions, and the staff is pretty helpful too! It is a must to stay here and experience Istanbul in its true essence!!!

Reviews.Title: “How I am surprised of this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MohammadFF
Reviews.Content: I have been in this hotel from 8sept. 2011 till 12sept.2011 . The room was beautiful and could be considered as a very good hotel. The biggest reson that made me to write this review is the service given by every personel of the hotel. They were very kind , smiley , goodlooking and friendly and honnest. and if I want to be honnest have to tel I did not expected like this behavior of Turkish people. It was my birthday and they celebrated me by a birthday cake and a beautiful gift at the lobby so other passengers came to me and sayed congratulations to me . It was newly built and was very beautiful, as I am a civil engineer I spotted on the building and have to say it is very nice building . It will be my second chiose if I go to Turkye again .

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place to stay”
Reviews.Author: yusuf41
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this place is that the staff have a friendly "Yes, I can do" attitude. The rooms are new and very comfortable, and the hotel is located exactly where a tourist needs to be in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Modern luxurious hotel with caring staff and a great price”
Reviews.Author: 50CountriesSoFar
Reviews.Content: When I checked in here I was immediately greeted with a warm welcome. After checking in I went to the roof (amazing views) and was tracked down by a smartly dressed waiter who was sent up to give me a welcome drink. I had an early flight the next morning which I mentioned when I checked in and the receptionist called over to the kitchen to ask them to set out some pastries and coffee for me at 5:45, several hours before the breakfast buffet. The rooms are beautifully decorated with a modern design with a turkish flair, and the bathroom was beautiful. I went to the spa and turkish bath in the hotel that evening (open until 10) and it was lovely. I could not recommend this place more highly.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel, best servis in istanbul”
Reviews.Author: gunay o
Reviews.Content: Location, location ,location..... Walking distance to the most important places to visit Best service and best emloyees The most comfortable beds Breakfast was our most enjoyable time with an excellent service and delicious food

Reviews.Title: “Better than every expectations”
Reviews.Author: damicopietro
Reviews.Content: Nerion hotel has been really a marvellous surprise. The staff is always willing to help and to suggest the best options to visit the town. Not only was breakfast included, but also a buffet lunch was offered from 1 pm till late afternoon. What's more, they offered a drink in the evening, on the terrace of the hotel, to enjoy the sunset and the marvellous landscape of Golden Horn and Bosphorus. Despite its not being very big, the room was stilish, fully equipped and very comfortable. The position for visiting the city is perfect: it is located btween two tramways stations, Sirkeci and Gulhane, and very close to Eminonu ferries. The main amenities, such as The Blue Mosque and Aja Sophia, are at walking distance, no more than 5 minutes. I would definitely suggest it.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it!!!!”
Reviews.Author: dubaisheik
Reviews.Content: Great staff, Great location and overall perfect way to end our Turkey holiday. I would totally recommend this hotel. We have travelled a lot and would have to say our hotel experience at the Neorion really was one we will remember for a long time.

Reviews.Title: “Sensational hotel in fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: BrigitteTG
Reviews.Content: The Neorion was the best hotel experience we have had in a long time. The rooms are well appointed with quality linens and very comfortable beds, and the shower was a delight with good pressure and plenty of hot water. The location is perfect with ready access to all the sights as well as the tram. The service was impeccable, and the staff very knowledgeable and always ready to help and provide advice.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding facility and service in a new hotel”
Reviews.Author: ChemistRB
Reviews.Content: I rented two rooms for my family vacation in Istanbul and we really enjoyed this hotel. From our very clean and new rooms, the huge breakfast buffet, the afternoon tea and sandwiches, the rooftop tables to enjoy the sunset and the private hamam in the basement, everything was just superb. It is also close to all the attractions. We stayed in other hotels in our trip to Turkey, and although they were comparble in price, this one was really the best we stayed in. Everything worked, no night noise etc.

Reviews.Title: “Would not hesitate to stay again - a lovely introduction to Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: GordonLin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I (seasoned travelers, 60 years of age, unattached to any tour groups) - stayed for 4 nights in the Neorion Hotel in June 2011. We had originally booked to stay in the Erboy Hotel (a sister hotel of the Group - just around the corner). Although our accommodation at the Erboy was available as planned, we were offered the option of trying out the nearby, newly opened Neorion. This upgrade was at no extra cost. It had just recently opened and certain of the planned facilities were yet to be completed (such as the indoor swimming pool). Nevertheless, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay - and would not hesitate to revisit. The rooms were comfortable, spotless and fully met our expectations and needs. Nice touches such as thick toweling gowns, kettle with complimentary tea, coffee .. mini bar fridge, bottled water (and lovely Turkish Delight). An extensive buffet breakfast is served and is included in the price of the room. We found all the people within the Group (& Neorion in particular) - with whom we interacted, to be service driven with a genuine desire to be helpful. Both before our trip to Turkey and upon our return, we were contacted by the hotel's guest relations department to enquire if we required any assistance with our planned holiday and subsequently if we were satisfied with our stay. A map was provided upon arrival and we were given helpful tips to facilitate our intended itinerary - even the mobile number our the guest relations contact - should we experience any problems whilst out touring. Notwithstanding minor things that understandably still had to be sorted out / completed (reception area facilities etc) - we really have no complaints. The hotel is very well situated close to all major attractions and transport - although we reached most of them on foot. We never felt unsafe walking home at all hours of the night. There are many restaurants to suit all tastes and pockets in the area. The hotel group also has excellent restaurants in the city and they offer discounts at these establishments if you are a guest in one of their hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Super and we loved the stay! We recommend!”
Reviews.Author: ZuMarciano
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff, just great! Professionnal and competent! We appreciated a lot the days we were in. Breakfast impecable, a lot of options. We loved it. If we return to Istanbul, be sure, we stayging there again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful service and breathtaking views!”
Reviews.Author: Kate C
Reviews.Content: We were really impressed with the service we received - the staff made us feel truly at home from the moment we arrived until the moment we left. Nothing was too much trouble and they went out of their way to make our trip a memorable one. The rooms are a good size and attractively furnished. Cool and quiet at night. Very close to the tourist locations - e.g. only a 5 minutes walk from Topkapi Palace. The view from the hotel's rooftop terrace is breathtaking - especially at night. We loved to go up there with a glass of wine and watch the sun set. We would thoroughly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel we have ever stayed, we definately will be back”
Reviews.Author: Wendyhl
Reviews.Content: My family and I are from Newcastle England, we had the best holiday in Istanbul, but this was only made so special by the staff and hotel, the staff could not do enough to make your stay to feel home from home, the rooms were beautiful, so clean and stylish, the staff and management were very well presented, very polite and helpful, and wanted to get involved in planning any activities we wished to do. the selection of food available buffet, was outstanding I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is appreciative in the nicer things in life, can not say enough good comments above the over all stay at the hotel. Thank you everyone at Neorion x

Reviews.Title: “New, Clean, Well-Located Hotel in the Old City”
Reviews.Author: lizrosej
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at the Neorion Hotel. The staff was lovely -- very attentive and helpful and friendly. The rooms are quiet and clean. The hotel has a wonderful breakfast -- which is included in the price of the rooms. The hotel is a short walk to all of the sites in the old city. The hotel also has a pool and a Turkish bath. The Neorion also has a very nice roof with a restaurant and an area to lounge in. You can see the city from the roof top and it's shaded, so it is a lovely way to end a long day of walking. Here is the website: http://www.neorionhotel.com/

Reviews.Title: “Outstandingly Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: G2626
Reviews.Content: On arrival at the Orient Express Hotel, we were told that we had been upgraded to a brand new hotel, Neorion. We were hesitant to look at it as we had booked the Orient Express for its location and the indoor swimming pool it had for the kids which was a must on our holidays. The Neorion certainly outlived our expectations on all accounts, location, amenities, hospitality, cleanness and variety of food. I would like to say how lovely our trip was to Istanbul and the Neorion family especially with their friendly warm manner, helpfulness, politeness and continuously being there with a smile on your face made the trip even more wonderful. It is one of the best holiday I have had and it has been all down to them. The welcoming, the service received on arrival, departure and stay, the food availability, and the cleanness of the hotel, were superb and I was really happy to have stayed there. The view from the terrace was magnificent, the rooms were spacious, the indoor swimming pool was always clean, the staff were very accommodating on all accounts and it was just outstandingly brilliant. I would certainly be recommending Neorion Hotel to family and friends and to anyone reading this if they travel to Istanbul (old city) whether for pleasure or business.

Reviews.Title: “Highest quality”
Reviews.Author: Martineverwijs
Reviews.Content: We had a lovely time at this hotel. From the warm welcome, the good information, the comfortable beds and modern rooms and hammam in the basement. We had a nice glass of great wine with THE staff. It is by far THE best hotel where we ever stayed. We will sure be back.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dave0910
Reviews.Content: The Staff could not have been more friendly or helpful. The location is magnificent. The food was absolutely delicious - they even provide free Turkish snacks all afternoon! The terrace has fantastic views of the Bosphorus. Hotel facilities are new and very clean. Swimming pool and Turkish bath very nice! This hotel is a great find! If ever in Istanbul again we will definitely return to Neorion Hotel!

Reviews.Title: “I highly recommend this hotel to everyone”
Reviews.Author: merchiva
Reviews.Content: My son and I have recently visited Istanbul. We had previously searched for information about hotels in Istanbul and learned that Sirkeci hotels were all good, and decided to book at Ilkay hotel. Once there we were upgraded to Neorion hotel. At first, we were suspicious (and tired after the journey) and did not show much enthusiasm, but then we found that the room was beautiful and very comfortable, and nothing was missing to have the greatest holidays. The staff at the hotel are young but very kind and always try to help you. The location is very good, very near Hagia Sophia. Unfortunately there is no restaurant at the hotel, but they give you information about restaurants nearby, and a discount card to eat there. No wonder we will go back there the next time we visit this wonderful city.

Reviews.Title: “We love Neorion Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tanyakarabanova
Reviews.Content: It's a wonderful hotel right at the center of historical part of Istanbul! The stuff is very attentive, kind and respectful! Whenever we needed any information we could easily get it(together with a detailed explanation and a map). The rooms are well-renovated and very claen! There is a lovely swimming-pool and Turkish sauna (and ordinary sauna as well). Breakfast is delicious!!!! We are going to come back because we loved everything!!!!!Neorion Hotel is the best!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fanastic hotel, great service, will definitely return”
Reviews.Author: Becs237
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Neorion just a few days after it opened and even with a couple of teething problems (room key cards not working & no hot water on the first morning) we couldn't fault any part of our stay. The staff were extremely friendly and went out of their way to help us. They arranged our transer to the airport and made us sandwiches to take with us for breakfast because our flight was so early in the morning. We were also given a gift on departure to apologise for the problems we'd had during our stay!! We'd had such a fantastic stay that we couldn't remember what problems they were referring to. The rooms were spotless, the buffet breakfast was great and the hotel location is perfect for visiting all areas of the city. We would definitely recommend this hotel and will certainly be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away fron Home!!”
Reviews.Author: VMLCanberra
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for an amazing place to stay whilst visiting Istanbul, you can't go past the Neorion Hotel. My stay in Istanbul lasted for 11 days and the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff here was outstanding during this time. My colleague and I actually began our extraordinary adventure at the Erboy Hotel but due to circumstances beyond our control there were no rooms available. So..... after a few hours of waiting around, wondering what would happen to us, we were offered upgraded accommodation at the Neorion at no extra expense. Weren't we the lucky ones!! The Staff at the Neorion could not do enough to help us. One day we were to meet a group of school children (6 as well as their parents) and they were more than happy to let us gather in their hotel lounge room. My colleague and I had to leave early every morning (right on 7:00am) to get to the competition venue and to meet the children; the staff at the Neorion could not do enough to make sure we had breakfast and anything else we needed before we left for the day. We had an amazing time in Istanbul, mixing business ( The National Robotics Competition) with pleasure, that included lots of long, tiring days siteseeing. We returned every night to beautifully clean rooms, that were spacious and tastefully decorated. We loved the copper serving bowl full of turkish delight! This wonderful cultural experience could not have been possible without the thoughtful and amazing staff at the Neorion. I can't wait to visit again because it certainly is 'A home away from home'.

Reviews.Title: “A most wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Florida32080
Reviews.Content: Beautiful rooms with every amenity, a lovely terrace, a beautiful pool and spa,van excellent full breakfast, and very comfortable lounge area. The location is perfect--walking distance to the Grand Bazaar, Topkapki Palace, Hagia Sophia, and the Blue Mosque. And the best imaginable service from everyone, from the front desk to the room maids--what more could you ask in a hotel?

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: ghadausa
Reviews.Content: Great location, great service. Thanks Behar and Zeynep (concierge attendants) for making it easy to plan our days in Istanbul! Surely recommended!

Reviews.Title: “New hotel with great location”
Reviews.Author: mawest54
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, very comfortable rooms, good location near metro, tourist attractions and walking distance from ferries. Due to construction across the street temporarily noisy during the night. Breakfast is elaborate and delicious. Formula of spa/sauna is a bit confusing: sauna is hot and spacious enough, but cooling down is a problem (only one narrow shower) and it's not very clear if it's okay to leave your clothes off (as is usual in nordic countries).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in prime location”
Reviews.Author: Eric60608
Reviews.Content: Thank you Bahar,and the rest of the staff, for making my first trip to Istanbul such a great experience. I couldn't have been more pleased with the hotel. From the comfort and cleanliness of the rooms, to the friendliness of the staff, everything was beyond expectations.

Reviews.Title: “Difficult to improve!”
Reviews.Author: paleoapache
Reviews.Content: I came here by chance as another hotel of the same group had booking problems and we were directed her. At the end I was asked by a member of the staff about suggestions to improve and I couldn't find any. Large rooms, free spa in the basement, cleanness. But the best of it was the quality of the staff, ready to help and able to do so, with internet, dinner recommendations, transfers, whatever. It is in very well located at the very center of Istabbul old town, so do not expect open water swimming pool and that kind of things.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect brand new hotel for relaxing afters days of walking...”
Reviews.Author: elsei
Reviews.Content: We spent 13 nights in the NEORION hotel, in Istanbul: (french couple, sorry for my bad english) in july 2011. - rooms: very good, clean, with space, television with 38 channels and different languages, big big shower in marble bathroom with veeery big towels, lukums (and cocktail) when we arrived, very good large bed with four pillows, locking safe, manual air-conditionning, little terrace... - Breakfast: from 7 to 11am, you have got an army of people ready to help you, from the service of turkish tea to the planning of your day by printing for you all the necessary informations. Exceptional choice of dishes, with 4 cheese, 2 kinds of olive, ham, eggs, bacon, 2 kinds of sausages, vegetables, various nuts, 5-6 kinds of jam, cereals, different breads, fruits, fresh homemade orangejuice...... (we did not even need to have lunch in 15 days because of the great breakfast.. so we were more efficient during our visits) and a real alveolar 30cmx60cm honey bar ! - Pool, jacuzzi, sauna, turkish bath: medium sized pool but still usable for swimming without fear, you MUST try the full marble turkish bath... lying on a warm marble stone bed is a true moment of paradise. They kept our luggage on the last day of our trip, that was very kind. Now, the most important: it is the most central place in Istanbul: we didn't even buy metro tickets during our trip, the most popular attractions are within 15 minutes by foot, and (like for us) if you want to discover the whole city, you can reach the most delightfull or typical places, with absolutely no tourists, by walking in every direction. (Fener, balat, are worth seeing, please do not stick to tourist zones... but you will love the topkapi harem, Haya sophia, archeological museums, 6hours bosphorus tour or the beautiful Semsi ahmet pasa Camii.. ) We went everywhere by foot and boat. We got a 10% dicount on all the four roof-terrace hotels of the Sirkeci group, (all centered in the same historical zone, within 200 meters) with magic view on Istanbul. (The Neorion hotel is brand new, so the restaurant was not done yet) . Our prefered restaurant was the Orient Express Hotel restaurant (called Imbat), we looked at the menus from time to time (of the 4 restaurants) at the erboy hotel which was situated 100meters above ours. Wine glasses were refrigerated, exceptional food at correct price (half the prices of similar french restaurants), and the view, always the view..

Reviews.Title: “It will always be our first choice!”
Reviews.Author: tana_11
Reviews.Content: Located in the center of the historic town, within walking distance of the main cultural and tourist attractions, Neorion Hotel definitely has a touch of elegance and good taste. The service is excellent and the staff are extremely friendly, polite and willing to offer help and assistance at any time. We felt welcome and were treated more as family than passing tourists. We will surely go back!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with superb service”
Reviews.Author: MarcoNL87
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend had originally booked Erboy, but were upgraded to Neorion. My original scepticism was blown away when we entered the Neorion hotel. The hotel is nicely decorated and as soon as you enter the staff makes you feel welcome. While we were waiting for our hotel keys, one of the concierge girls gave us some information about the hotel and Istanbul while we were having a drink in the comfortable lounge. This started of our stay very comfortably. During our stay the reception staff and girls have often helped us with small things in impeccable English, a welcome relief. The room we had was not the largest but still large enough and very clean. The bed was large and comfortable and the shower (large & small shower head) were very comfortable. The air-conditioning did its job to keep our room cool (with outside temperatures around 30 degrees C) and the room was quite when the window was closed. Free WIFI internet was available throughout the entire hotel and I had a good (4/5) connection in both the room and lobby. The 2 elevators are small, but fast, so you almost never have to wait long for them. Breakfast was very nice and you could get a quick tea with a bite (small meze) if you wanted in the afternoon. We didn't use the indoor swimming pool, but we did go to see it and it looked clean and very quiet. Overall the service is superb and the hotel is very nice!

Reviews.Title: “Sit back and relax!”
Reviews.Author: E_DSMT
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a short trip to Istanbul with my mother. We stayed at the Neorion hotel and loved it. Everything you could ask for was available, swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, hammam, .... and the hotel has THE best location. They really looked at all the details, like for exemple: in the 'living room' you could have free coffee and tea, cookies and mezze's from 14-19 o'clock. Also, there was always somebody available for information about the city and to help you plan your trip. If I must post some criticisms: There was no information book in the room (with opening hours swimming pool, tv channels, breakfast hours, etc.). There was free coffee and thee, but no drinks (alcohol or soft drinks), except than in the minibar. The wonderfull terrace was not yet being used (no seat or anything). But I guess all this will be added in the future. And to be honest, you could eat at all the restaurants of the sirkeci groupo with a 10% discount and free coffee after dinner. Oh and maybe just one remark about Istanbul itself: sulthanamet (old city, all the major historical buildings, crowded) and moda (modern, relaxed, quiet) are the best places to walk around. But don't go to adalar. What a rip off, we had to pay 3.25 TL/pereson to walk around on the island (Heybeliada) and to be able to reeach the beach, but then we had to pay yet again 10 TL/person to acces the beach and to be able to swim. Also, the waiters are really arrogant.

Reviews.Title: “Misafir means more than just a guest”
Reviews.Author: Nick_MonLondon
Reviews.Content: We had originally booked Erboy hotel, but upon our arrival we were told the good news that we had been upgraded to the newly-built Neorion Hotel. From the beginning of our stay to the very end we were treated like family. Such unfailing hospitality we have never come across. They helped us in every way they could - they gave us maps, made restaurant reservations for us, arranged taxis, etc. On the rare occasion we had a problem, it was dealt with within 5mins. But not even these concrete examples can encapsulate the warmth and friendliness which was present throughout the hotel emanating from the wonderful staff. With regards to location, the hotel is situated approximately halfway between Ankara Caddesi (leading down to Galata Bridge) and Alemdar Caddesi (leading to the At MeydanÄ±). With regards to our room, it was silent if the balcony door was closed, the bed was supremely comfortable, and the shower was second to none. We are already looking for tickets to re-visit Istanbul, and we will not settle for any hotel but this one. A very big thank you to Bahar Ã–zdemir, Fatih GÃ¶zÃ¼sulu, Halit Ã–zsoy, Semih ÅžentÃ¼rk, and the spa man for making our honeymoon extra special. We hope to see you all again very soon.

Reviews.Title: “A LOVELY, VERY HIGH LEVEL QUALITY AND WARM CHARM'S HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: Hakke
Reviews.Content: Dear all travellers who like TURKEY, With my wife, we know TURKEY since 24 years and we used to go to this fabulous country 4 or 5 times per year in different areas., especially in Istanbul. We used to go to charming hotels not in all inclusive hotels. We staif in last june in NEORION hotel which just opened. We really enjoyed our stay in this hotel which is perfect : perfect cleanliness, very well located just near by the historical area SULTANAHMET (5 minutes walking) and nor far from the business area TAKSIM (around 20 minutes with the tramway), marvellous breakfasts, such warm and friendly turkish wellcome, well decorated and large rooms. This hotels belongs to the family SIRKECI group (www.sirkecikonak.com) and is a high level quality hotel as the other SIRKECI KONAK. You can be confident and we are sure you'll enjoy your stay in this hotel. Wgen we staid, the restaurant was not yet opened but we are also sure it suit everybody especially the real travellers who expect to discover and understand turkish culture. We hope you a lovely stay in TURKEY, the hospitality country. Best Regards Jean - Pierre and Fabienne from France

HotelInfo.Name: Neorion Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Orhaniye Street No:14 | Sirkeci, Istanbul 34120, Turkey
